S'Etusivu \xe2\x80\x93 Wikitravel Auta Wikitravelia kasvamaan muokkaamalla artikkelia! Opi t\xc3\xa4st\xc3\xa4 Etusivu Wikitravel Loikkaa: valikkoon , hakuun Wikitravel Wikitravel on hanke, jonka tarkoituksena on luoda vapaa , kattava, ajantasainen ja luotettava maailmanlaajuinen matkaopas . T\xc3\xa4h\xc3\xa4n menness\xc3\xa4 oppaita ja muita sivuja on kirjoitettu suomeksi 1\xc2\xa0651 . Ohjesivu kertoo miten sin\xc3\xa4 voit muokata Wikitravelin sivuja samantien . Osallistu keskusteluun kestikievarissa ja auta valamaan Wikitravelille vankat perustukset. Kuukauden kohde Singapore ,on piskuinen mutta vauras kaupunkivaltio Malaijan niemimaan k\xc3\xa4rjess\xc3\xa4. L\xc3\xa4mp\xc3\xb6tila Singaporessa on noin +25-30\xc2\xb0C l\xc3\xa4pi vuoden, joten se on sopii mainiosti talvikohteeksi karkuun Suomen kylm\xc3\xa4\xc3\xa4 talvea. Sy\xc3\xb6minen ja shoppailu ovat Singaporen kansallisurheilut, ja hintatasokin on kovasti eurooppaa matalampi. ( lis\xc3\xa4\xc3\xa4... ) Maailma Suomi Kuopio \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Helsinki \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Rovaniemi \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Tampere \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Turku \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Kilpisj\xc3\xa4rvi \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Kotka \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Pyht\xc3\xa4\xc3\xa4 Eurooppa Hampuri \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Petroskoi \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Pietari \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Romania \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Rooma \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Ruotsi \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Tallinna \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Tukholma Afrikka Sambia \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Kapkaupunki \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Egypti \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Etel\xc3\xa4-Afrikka \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Marokko \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xb7 Kenia \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Kairo \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Tansania Aasia Ko Tao \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Tokio \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Bangkok \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Singapore \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Japani \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Thaimaa \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Mumbai \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Intia \xc2\xb7 Tel Aviv \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Irak \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Jerusalem \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Syyria Australia & Oseania Melbourne \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Tonga Kuuba \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Puerto Rico \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Barbados Etel\xc3\xa4-Amerikka Kolumbia \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Chile \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Peru \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Brasilia \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Argentiina Matkailuaiheet Reitit \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Trans-Siperian juna \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Lennot maailman ymp\xc3\xa4ri \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Euroopan halpalentoyhti\xc3\xb6t \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 Luettelo kansainv\xc3\xa4lisist\xc3\xa4 suuntanumeroista Matkasanakirjat englanti \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 japani \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 romania \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 italia \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 saksa \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 espanja \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 ruotsi \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 ven\xc3\xa4j\xc3\xa4 \xc2\xa0\xc2\xb7 thai Ty\xc3\xb6kalut Artikkelit Kuukauden talkookohde Nuuksion kansallispuisto Heikkolaatuinen artikkeli t\xc3\xa4rke\xc3\xa4st\xc3\xa4 kohteesta, joka on valittu erityisen huomion kohteeksi kuukauden ajan. Sukella rohkeasti sis\xc3\xa4\xc3\xa4n! Kuukauden kohde Singapore Auta valitsemaan tulevat kohteet kirjoita joko Kestikievariin tai Kuukauden kohde -sivun keskustelupalstalle! S'Wikitravel:Wikimatkaajat \xe2\x80\x93 Wikitravel Auta Wikitravelia kasvamaan muokkaamalla artikkelia! Opi t\xc3\xa4st\xc3\xa4 Wikitravel:Wikimatkaajat Wikitravel Loikkaa: valikkoon , hakuun Wikimatkaajat ovat suomenkielisen Wikitravel -yhteis\xc3\xb6n j\xc3\xa4seni\xc3\xa4 ja luonnollisesti samalla my\xc3\xb6s Wikitravelin kirjoittajia. Kaikki heist\xc3\xa4 eiv\xc3\xa4t asu Suomessa (tarkalleen ottaen kaikki eiv\xc3\xa4t edes ymm\xc3\xa4rr\xc3\xa4 suomea!), mutta ovat kuitenkin mukana suomenkielisen Wikitravelin kirjoittamisessa, kuvittamisessa tai yll\xc3\xa4pit\xc3\xa4misess\xc3\xa4. Wikimatkaajat eiv\xc3\xa4t ole mik\xc3\xa4\xc3\xa4n tarkkaan rajattu homogeeninen joukko, mutta voidaan varmaankin sanoa, ett\xc3\xa4 wikimatkaajat noin yleisesti ovat kiinnostuneet matkailusta ja avoimesta tiedon jakamisesta. Wikimatkaajat eiv\xc3\xa4t muodosta mit\xc3\xa4\xc3\xa4n salaseuraa tai sis\xc3\xa4piiri\xc3\xa4, vaan ovat ihan tavallisia ihmisi\xc3\xa4 kuten sin\xc3\xa4kin. Jokin vet\xc3\xa4\xc3\xa4 meit\xc3\xa4 tien p\xc3\xa4\xc3\xa4lle, l\xc3\xa4helle tai kauas, ja haluamme jakaa tietoamme ja kokemuksiamme muiden matkaajien avuksi. My\xc3\xb6s sin\xc3\xa4 voit ryhty\xc3\xa4 wikimatkaajaksi! Tarvitsemme apuasi tehd\xc3\xa4ksemme Wikitravelin suomenkielisest\xc3\xa4 versiosta englanninkielisen version kaltaisen menestystarinan. Ja tekemist\xc3\xa4 riitt\xc3\xa4\xc3\xa4 - jokainen askel eteenp\xc3\xa4in vie meid\xc3\xa4t kohti tavoitettamme: luotettavaa, kattavaa, ilmaista ja vapaata maailmanlaajuista matkaopasta. Haettu osoitteesta http://wikitravel.org/fi/Wikitravel:Wikimatkaajat Henkil\xc3\xb6kohtaiset ty\xc3\xb6kalut Kirjaudu sis\xc3\xa4\xc3\xa4n tai luo tunnus Kirjaudu OpenID:ll\xc3\xa4 Nimiavaruudet Projektisivu Keskustelu Muuttujat N\xc3\xa4kym\xc3\xa4t Lue Muokkaa N\xc3\xa4yt\xc3\xa4 historia Toiminnot Haku Valikko Etusivu Kestikievari Ajankohtaista Tuoreet muutokset Satunnainen sivu Ohje sitesupport Wikitravel Shared Docents About Docent Ty\xc3\xb6kalut T\xc3\xa4nne viittaavat sivut Linkitettyjen sivujen muutokset Toimintosivut Tulostettava versio Ikilinkki Muilla kielill\xc3\xa4 ca : Wikiviatgers de : Wikitraveller en : Wikitravellers es : Wikiviajeros fr : Wikivoyageurs it : Wikitravellers ja : \xe3\x82\xa6\xe3\x82\xa3\xe3\x82\xad\xe3\x83\x88\xe3\x83\xa9\xe3\x83\x99\xe3\x83\xa9\xe3\x83\xbc ko : Wikitravellers nl : Wikitravellers pt : Wikiviajantes ro : Wikic\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83tori ru : \xd0\x92\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbf\xd1\x83\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5\xd1\x88\xd0\xb5\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbd\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 sv : Wikiresen\xc3\xa4rer zh : \xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe8\x80\x85 Sivua on viimeksi muutettu 2. marraskuuta 2009 kello 13.33. S'\xd7\xa2\xd7\x9e\xd7\x95\xd7\x93 \xd7\xa8\xd7\x90\xd7\xa9\xd7\x99 \xe2\x80\x93 \xd7\x95\xd7\x99\xd7\xa7\xd7\x99\xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9e\xd7\x95\xd7\x93 \xd7\xa8\xd7\x90\xd7\xa9\xd7\x99 \xd7\x9e\xd7\xaa\xd7\x95\xd7\x9a \xd7\x95\xd7\x99\xd7\xa7\xd7\x99\xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c \xd7\xa7\xd7\xa4\xd7\x99\xd7\xa6\xd7\x94 \xd7\x90\xd7\x9c: \xd7\xa0\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x95\xd7\x98 , \xd7\x97\xd7\x99\xd7\xa4\xd7\x95\xd7\xa9 \xd7\x91\xd7\xa8\xd7\x95\xd7\x9b\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x94\xd7\x91\xd7\x90\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9c\xd7\x95\xd7\x95\xd7\x99\xd7\xa7\xd7\x99\xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c \xd7\x95\xd7\x99\xd7\xa7\xd7\x99\xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c \xd7\x94\xd7\x99\xd7\xa0\xd7\x95 \xd7\x9e\xd7\x99\xd7\x96\xd7\x9d \xd7\xa8\xd7\x91-\xd7\x9c\xd7\xa9\xd7\x95\xd7\xa0\xd7\x99 \xd7\xa9\xd7\xa0\xd7\x95\xd7\xa2\xd7\x93 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\xa6\xd7\x95\xd7\xa8 \xd7\x9e\xd7\x93\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\x9a \xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\xa2\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c\xd7\x9e\xd7\x99 \xd7\x97\xd7\x95\xd7\xa4\xd7\xa9\xd7\x99 , \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa2\xd7\x95\xd7\x93\xd7\x9b\xd7\x9f \xd7\x95\xd7\x90\xd7\x9e\xd7\x99\xd7\x9f. \xd7\x95\xd7\x99\xd7\xa7\xd7\x99\xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c \xd7\xa0\xd7\x9b\xd7\xaa\xd7\x91 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9c \xd7\x99\xd7\x93\xd7\x99 \xd7\x94\xd7\x92\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c\xd7\xa9\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa8\xd7\x97\xd7\x91\xd7\x99 \xd7\x94\xd7\xa2\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c\xd7\x9d, \xd7\x95\xd7\x94\xd7\x95\xd7\x90 \xd7\x92\xd7\x93\xd7\x9c \xd7\x90\xd7\x9a \xd7\x95\xd7\xa8\xd7\xa7 \xd7\x91\xd7\xa2\xd7\x96\xd7\xa8\xd7\xaa\xd7\x9b\xd7\x9d . \xd7\xa8\xd7\x90\xd7\x94 \xd7\x90\xd7\x99\xd7\x9a \xd7\x92\xd7\x9d \xd7\x90\xd7\xaa\xd7\x94 \xd7\x99\xd7\x9b\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c \xd7\x9c\xd7\xa2\xd7\x96\xd7\x95\xd7\xa8 \xd7\x95 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x9b\xd7\xaa\xd7\x95\xd7\x91 \xd7\xa2\xd7\xa8\xd7\x9b\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9b\xd7\x91\xd7\xa8 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9b\xd7\xa9\xd7\x99\xd7\x95 . \xd7\xa7\xd7\xa8\xd7\x90 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x95\xd7\x93 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x95\xd7\x95\xd7\x99\xd7\xa7\xd7\x99\xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c: 102 \xd7\xa2\xd7\xa8\xd7\x9b\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x90\xd7\x99\xd7\x9a \xd7\x9c\xd7\x94\xd7\xa9\xd7\xaa\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa9 \xd7\x91\xd7\x90\xd7\xaa\xd7\xa8? \xd7\x9b\xd7\x93\xd7\x99 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa6\xd7\x95\xd7\x90 \xd7\x90\xd7\xaa \xd7\x94\xd7\x9e\xd7\x99\xd7\x93\xd7\xa2 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9c \xd7\x94\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa7\xd7\x95\xd7\x9d \xd7\x90\xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\x95 \xd7\x90\xd7\xaa\xd7\x9d \xd7\xa8\xd7\x95\xd7\xa6\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9c\xd7\x94\xd7\x92\xd7\x99\xd7\xa2, \xd7\x94\xd7\x93\xd7\xa8\xd7\x9a \xd7\x94\xd7\xa4\xd7\xa9\xd7\x95\xd7\x98\xd7\x94 \xd7\x91\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa\xd7\xa8 \xd7\x94\xd7\x99\xd7\x90 \xd7\x9c\xd7\xa8\xd7\xa9\xd7\x95\xd7\x9d \xd7\x90\xd7\xaa \xd7\xa9\xd7\x9d \xd7\x94\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa7\xd7\x95\xd7\x9d \xd7\x91\xd7\xaa\xd7\x99\xd7\x91\xd7\xaa \xd7\x94\xd7\x97\xd7\x99\xd7\xa4\xd7\x95\xd7\xa9 \xd7\xa9\xd7\x91\xd7\xa6\xd7\x93 \xd7\x94\xd7\x99\xd7\x9e\xd7\x99\xd7\xa0\xd7\x99 \xd7\xa9\xd7\x9c \xd7\x94\xd7\x93\xd7\xa4\xd7\x93\xd7\xa4\xd7\x9f, \xd7\x95\xd7\x9c\xd7\x9c\xd7\x97\xd7\x95\xd7\xa5 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9c "\xd7\xa2\xd7\x91\xd7\x95\xd7\xa8". \xd7\x90\xd7\x9d \xd7\x94\xd7\xa2\xd7\xa8\xd7\x9a \xd7\x9c\xd7\x90 \xd7\xa7\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\xaa\xd7\x95\xd7\x9b\xd7\x9c\xd7\x95 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x9b\xd7\xaa\xd7\x95\xd7\x91 \xd7\x90\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa\xd7\x95. \xd7\xa7\xd7\x99\xd7\xa9\xd7\x95\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9c\xd7\xa2\xd7\xa8\xd7\x9b\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9e\xd7\x95\xd7\xa6\xd7\x92\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x91\xd7\xa6\xd7\x91\xd7\xa2, \xd7\x9b\xd7\xa9\xd7\x9b\xd7\x97\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa6\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9f \xd7\xa2\xd7\xa8\xd7\x9a \xd7\xa7\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\xa9\xd7\x9c\xd7\x97\xd7\x99\xd7\xa6\xd7\x94 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\x95 \xd7\xaa\xd7\x95\xd7\x91\xd7\x99\xd7\x9c \xd7\x9c\xd7\xa4\xd7\xaa\xd7\x99\xd7\x97\xd7\xaa\xd7\x95, \xd7\x95\xd7\x90\xd7\x93\xd7\x95\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa1\xd7\x9e\xd7\x9c \xd7\xa2\xd7\xa8\xd7\x9a \xd7\xa9\xd7\xa2\xd7\x93\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9f \xd7\x9c\xd7\x90 \xd7\xa0\xd7\x9b\xd7\xaa\xd7\x91, \xd7\x9c\xd7\x97\xd7\x99\xd7\xa6\xd7\x94 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\x95 \xd7\xaa\xd7\x95\xd7\x91\xd7\x99\xd7\x9c \xd7\x9c\xd7\x93\xd7\xa3 \xd7\xa2\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\x9b\xd7\x94. \xd7\xa9\xd7\x99\xd7\x9e\xd7\x95 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x91! \xd7\x9c\xd7\x97\xd7\x99\xd7\xa6\xd7\x94 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9c \xd7\xaa\xd7\x9e\xd7\x95\xd7\xa0\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa \xd7\x9c\xd7\x90 \xd7\xaa\xd7\x95\xd7\x91\xd7\x99\xd7\x9c \xd7\x90\xd7\xaa\xd7\x9b\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9c\xd7\xa2\xd7\xa8\xd7\x9b\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x90\xd7\x9c\xd7\x90 \xd7\xa8\xd7\xa7 \xd7\xaa\xd7\x92\xd7\x93\xd7\x99\xd7\x9c \xd7\x90\xd7\xaa \xd7\x94\xd7\xaa\xd7\x9e\xd7\x95\xd7\xa0\xd7\x94. \xd7\x90\xd7\x99\xd7\xa8\xd7\x95\xd7\xa4\xd7\x94 \xd7\x90\xd7\xa1\xd7\x99\xd7\x94 \xd7\x90\xd7\xa4\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\xa7\xd7\x94 \xd7\xa6\xd7\xa4\xd7\x95\xd7\x9f \xd7\x90\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\xa7\xd7\x94 \xd7\x93\xd7\xa8\xd7\x95\xd7\x9d \xd7\x90\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\xa7\xd7\x94 \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa8\xd7\x9b\xd7\x96 \xd7\x90\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\xa7\xd7\x94 \xd7\x90\xd7\x95\xd7\xa1\xd7\x98\xd7\xa8\xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\x94 \xd7\xa0\xd7\x95\xd7\xa9\xd7\x90\xd7\x99 \xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c \xd7\xa9\xd7\x99\xd7\x97\xd7\x95\xd7\xa0\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x99\xd7\xa9\xd7\xa8\xd7\x90\xd7\x9c \xd7\x94\xd7\xa4\xd7\x90\xd7\x91 \xd7\x9c\xd7\xa9\xd7\x90\xd7\x9c\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa \xd7\x91\xd7\xa0\xd7\x95\xd7\xa9\xd7\x90\xd7\x99 \xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c \xd7\xa2\xd7\x96\xd7\xa8\xd7\x94 \xd7\x99\xd7\xa2\xd7\x93 \xd7\x94\xd7\x97\xd7\x95\xd7\x93\xd7\xa9 \xd7\x91\xd7\xa2\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9c\xd7\xa0\xd7\x98\xd7\x90\xd7\x95 \xd7\x94\xd7\x95\xd7\x90 \xd7\x94\xd7\x90\xd7\x99 \xd7\x94\xd7\x92\xd7\x93\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c \xd7\x91\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa\xd7\xa8 \xd7\x91 \xd7\x94\xd7\x95\xd7\xa0\xd7\x92 \xd7\xa7\xd7\x95\xd7\xa0\xd7\x92 . \xd7\x9c\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa8\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa \xd7\x96\xd7\x90\xd7\xaa \xd7\x94\xd7\x99\xd7\x94 \xd7\x94\xd7\x90\xd7\x99 \xd7\x91\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa9\xd7\x9a \xd7\xa9\xd7\xa0\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9b\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa2\xd7\x98 \xd7\x95\xd7\x9c\xd7\x90 \xd7\x9e\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\xa9\xd7\x91, \xd7\x90\xd7\x95\xd7\x9b\xd7\x9c\xd7\x95\xd7\xa1\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\xaa\xd7\x95 \xd7\x94\xd7\xa2\xd7\x99\xd7\xa7\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\xaa \xd7\xa9\xd7\x9c \xd7\x94\xd7\x90\xd7\x99 \xd7\x94\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\xaa\xd7\x94 \xd7\xa9\xd7\x9c \xd7\xa0\xd7\x96\xd7\x99\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x91\xd7\x95\xd7\x93\xd7\x94\xd7\x99\xd7\xa1\xd7\x99\xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\xa9\xd7\x97\xd7\xa4\xd7\xa9\xd7\x95 \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa7\xd7\x95\xd7\x9d \xd7\x91\xd7\x95 \xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9b\xd7\x9c\xd7\x95 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x92\xd7\x95\xd7\xa8 \xd7\x91\xd7\xa9\xd7\xa7\xd7\x98 \xd7\x95\xd7\x91\xd7\xa9\xd7\x9c\xd7\x95\xd7\x95\xd7\x94 \xd7\x94\xd7\xa8\xd7\x97\xd7\xa7 \xd7\x9e\xd7\x94\xd7\x9e\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c\xd7\xaa \xd7\x94\xd7\xa2\xd7\x99\xd7\xa8, \xd7\x95\xd7\x93\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x92\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d. \xd7\x90\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9e\xd7\x90\xd7\x96 \xd7\x94\xd7\xa7\xd7\x9e\xd7\xaa\xd7\x95 \xd7\xa9\xd7\x9c \xd7\xa9\xd7\x93\xd7\x94 \xd7\x94\xd7\xaa\xd7\xa2\xd7\x95\xd7\xa4\xd7\x94 \xd7\xa6\'\xd7\xa7 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x90\xd7\xa4 \xd7\xa7\xd7\x95\xd7\xa7, \xd7\xa9\xd7\x94\xd7\x95\xd7\x90 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa2\xd7\xa9\xd7\x94 \xd7\x90\xd7\x93\xd7\x9e\xd7\x94 \xd7\x9e\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x91\xd7\xa9\xd7\xaa \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9c \xd7\x99\xd7\x93 \xd7\x94\xd7\x90\xd7\x99 \xd7\x9c\xd7\xa0\xd7\x98\xd7\x90\xd7\x95, \xd7\xa4\xd7\xaa\xd7\x99\xd7\x97\xd7\xaa \xd7\x94\xd7\x9b\xd7\x91\xd7\x99\xd7\xa9 \xd7\x94\xd7\x9e\xd7\x94\xd7\x99\xd7\xa8 \xd7\x95\xd7\x94\xd7\xa7\xd7\x9e\xd7\xaa \xd7\x92\xd7\xa9\xd7\xa8 \xd7\xa6\xd7\x99\xd7\xa0\xd7\x92 \xd7\x9e\xd7\x94, \xd7\x94\xd7\x97\xd7\x9c \xd7\x94\xd7\x90\xd7\x99 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x94\xd7\xaa\xd7\xa4\xd7\xaa\xd7\x97. \xd7\x9b\xd7\x9a \xd7\xa7\xd7\x9e\xd7\x94 \xd7\x94\xd7\xa2\xd7\x99\xd7\xa8 \xd7\x98\xd7\x95\xd7\xa0\xd7\x92 \xd7\xa6\'\xd7\x95\xd7\xa0\xd7\x92, \xd7\x90\xd7\x96 - \xd7\x91\xd7\xa2\xd7\x99\xd7\xa7\xd7\xa8 \xd7\x99\xd7\x9d, \xd7\x94\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9d - \xd7\x9e\xd7\x91\xd7\xa0\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x92\xd7\x91\xd7\x95\xd7\x94\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x94\xd7\x9e\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\xa9\xd7\x91\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x91\xd7\xa8\xd7\x95\xd7\x91\xd7\x9d. \xd7\x9c\xd7\x97\xd7\xa6\xd7\x95 \xd7\x9b\xd7\x90\xd7\x9f \xd7\x95\xd7\x94\xd7\xaa\xd7\x97\xd7\x99\xd7\x9c\xd7\x95 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9c \xd7\x99\xd7\xa2\xd7\x93 \xd7\x94\xd7\x97\xd7\x95\xd7\x93\xd7\xa9 \xd7\x91\xd7\x99\xd7\xa9\xd7\xa8\xd7\x90\xd7\x9c \xd7\xa2\xd7\x99\xd7\x9f \xd7\x92\xd7\x93\xd7\x99 \xd7\x94\xd7\x95\xd7\x90 \xd7\x90\xd7\x97\xd7\x93 \xd7\x9e\xd7\x90\xd7\xaa\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99 \xd7\x94\xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c \xd7\x94\xd7\xa4\xd7\x95\xd7\xa4\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x91\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa\xd7\xa8 \xd7\x91\xd7\x99\xd7\xa9\xd7\xa8\xd7\x90\xd7\x9c. \xd7\x94\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa2\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9f \xd7\xa9\xd7\x96\xd7\x95\xd7\xa8\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9b\xd7\x9c \xd7\x99\xd7\x9e\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa \xd7\x94\xd7\xa9\xd7\xa0\xd7\x94 \xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\xa6\xd7\xa8 \xd7\xa0\xd7\x99\xd7\x92\xd7\x95\xd7\x93 \xd7\x97\xd7\x93 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9d \xd7\x94\xd7\x9e\xd7\x93\xd7\x91\xd7\xa8 \xd7\xa9\xd7\xa1\xd7\x95\xd7\x91\xd7\x91 \xd7\x90\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa\xd7\x95, \xd7\x95\xd7\x94\xd7\xa7\xd7\x99\xd7\x91\xd7\x95\xd7\xa5 \xd7\xa9\xd7\x94\xd7\x95\xd7\xa7\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9b\xd7\x90\xd7\x9f \xd7\x9e\xd7\x94\xd7\x95\xd7\x95\xd7\x94 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x91\xd7\x95\xd7\xa8 \xd7\xa8\xd7\x91\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\xa1\xd7\x9e\xd7\x9c \xd7\x9c"\xd7\x94\xd7\xa4\xd7\xa8\xd7\x97\xd7\xaa \xd7\x94\xd7\xa0\xd7\x92\xd7\x91". \xd7\x91\xd7\xa9\xd7\x9e\xd7\x95\xd7\xa8\xd7\xaa \xd7\x94\xd7\x98\xd7\x91\xd7\xa2 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x99\xd7\x9f \xd7\x92\xd7\x93\xd7\x99 \xd7\xaa\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa6\xd7\x90\xd7\x95 \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa1\xd7\xa4\xd7\xa8 \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa1\xd7\x9c\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\xa9\xd7\x9e\xd7\xaa\xd7\x90\xd7\x99\xd7\x9e\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9c\xd7\x9e\xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9e\xd7\x9b\xd7\x9c \xd7\x94\xd7\xa1\xd7\x95\xd7\x92\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d, \xd7\x94\xd7\x97\xd7\x9c \xd7\x9e\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa1\xd7\x9c\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa9\xd7\xa4\xd7\x97\xd7\xaa\xd7\x99 \xd7\x91\xd7\xa7\xd7\xa8\xd7\x91\xd7\xaa \xd7\x94\xd7\x99\xd7\xa2\xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x95\xd7\x9b\xd7\x9c\xd7\x94 \xd7\x91\xd7\x98\xd7\xa8\xd7\xa7 \xd7\xa9\xd7\x9c \xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x9e\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x91\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa2\xd7\x9c\xd7\x94 \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa6\xd7\x95\xd7\xa7 \xd7\x94\xd7\x94\xd7\xa2\xd7\xaa\xd7\xa7\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d. \xd7\x9c\xd7\x97\xd7\xa6\xd7\x95 \xd7\x9b\xd7\x90\xd7\x9f \xd7\x95\xd7\x94\xd7\xaa\xd7\x97\xd7\x99\xd7\x9c\xd7\x95 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9c \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa7\xd7\x95\xd7\xa8: http://wikitravel.org/he/%D7%A2%D7%9E%D7%95%D7%93_%D7%A8%D7%90%D7%A9%D7%99 \xd7\x9b\xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x90\xd7\x99\xd7\xa9\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9b\xd7\xa0\xd7\x99\xd7\xa1\xd7\x94 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x97\xd7\xa9\xd7\x91\xd7\x95\xd7\x9f \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9d OpenID \xd7\x9b\xd7\xa0\xd7\x99\xd7\xa1\xd7\x94 \xd7\x9c\xd7\x97\xd7\xa9\xd7\x91\xd7\x95\xd7\x9f / \xd7\x94\xd7\xa8\xd7\xa9\xd7\x9e\xd7\x94 \xd7\x92\xd7\xa8\xd7\xa1\xd7\x90\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa \xd7\xa9\xd7\xa4\xd7\x94 \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa8\xd7\x97\xd7\x91\xd7\x99 \xd7\xa9\xd7\x9d \xd7\xa9\xd7\x99\xd7\x97\xd7\x94 \xd7\x93\xd7\xa3 \xd7\xaa\xd7\x95\xd7\x9b\xd7\x9f \xd7\x97\xd7\x99\xd7\xa4\xd7\x95\xd7\xa9 \xd7\xa4\xd7\xa2\xd7\x95\xd7\x9c\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa \xd7\xa6\xd7\xa4\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa \xd7\x94\xd7\xa6\xd7\x92\xd7\xaa \xd7\x94\xd7\x99\xd7\xa1\xd7\x98\xd7\x95\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\x94 \xd7\x94\xd7\xa6\xd7\x92\xd7\xaa \xd7\x9e\xd7\xa7\xd7\x95\xd7\xa8 \xd7\xa7\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\x90\xd7\x94 \xd7\xa0\xd7\x99\xd7\x95\xd7\x95\xd7\x98 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9e\xd7\x95\xd7\x93 \xd7\xa8\xd7\x90\xd7\xa9\xd7\x99 \xd7\x91\xd7\xa8\xd7\x95\xd7\x9b\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x94\xd7\x91\xd7\x90\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x94\xd7\xa4\xd7\x90\xd7\x91 (\xd7\xa4\xd7\x95\xd7\xa8\xd7\x95\xd7\x9d \xd7\x94\xd7\x9e\xd7\x98\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d) \xd7\x93\xd7\x9c\xd7\xa4\xd7\xa7 \xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\xa2\xd7\x95\xd7\xa5 \xd7\xa9\xd7\x99\xd7\xa0\xd7\x95\xd7\x99\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x90\xd7\x97\xd7\xa8\xd7\x95\xd7\xa0\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x93\xd7\xa3 \xd7\x90\xd7\xa7\xd7\xa8\xd7\x90\xd7\x99 \xd7\xa2\xd7\x96\xd7\xa8\xd7\x94 sitesupport Docents About Docent \xd7\xaa\xd7\x99\xd7\x91\xd7\xaa \xd7\x9b\xd7\x9c\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x93\xd7\xa4\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x94\xd7\x9e\xd7\xa7\xd7\x95\xd7\xa9\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\x9d \xd7\x9c\xd7\x9b\xd7\x90\xd7\x9f \xd7\xa7\xd7\x91\xd7\x95\xd7\xa2 \xd7\x93\xd7\xa3 \xd7\x96\xd7\x94 \xd7\x91\xd7\xa9\xd7\xa4\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa \xd7\x90\xd7\x97\xd7\xa8\xd7\x95\xd7\xaa ar : \xe0\xa4\x95\xe0\xa5\x8b \xe0\xa4\xac\xe0\xa4\xa6\xe0\xa4\xb2 \xe0\xa4\xb8\xe0\xa4\x95\xe0\xa4\xa4\xe0\xa5\x87 \xe0\xa4\xb9\xe0\xa5\x88\xe0\xa4\x82! \xe0\xa4\xae\xe0\xa5\x87\xe0\xa4\x82 \xe0\xa4\xb5\xe0\xa4\xbf\xe0\xa4\x95\xe0\xa4\xbf\xe0\xa4\x9f\xe0\xa5\x8d\xe0\xa4\xb0\xe0\xa5\x88\xe0\xa4\xb5\xe0\xa5\x87\xe0\xa4\xb2 \xe0\xa4\x95\xe0\xa5\x80 \xe0\xa4\xae\xe0\xa4\xa6\xe0\xa4\xa6 \xe0\xa4\x95\xe0\xa4\xb0\xe0\xa4\xa8\xe0\xa5\x87 \xe0\xa4\x95\xe0\xa5\x80 \xe0\xa4\x9c\xe0\xa4\xbe\xe0\xa4\xa8\xe0\xa4\x95\xe0\xa4\xbe\xe0\xa4\xb0\xe0\xa5\x80 \xe0\xa4\x9c\xe0\xa5\x81\xe0\xa4\xa1\xe0\xa5\x87 \xe0\xa4\xac\xe0\xa4\xa6\xe0\xa4\xb2\xe0\xa4\xbe\xe0\xa4\xb5 \xe0\xa4\xb5\xe0\xa4\xbf\xe0\xa4\xb6\xe0\xa5\x87\xe0\xa4\xb7 \xe0\xa4\xaa\xe0\xa4\xa8\xe0\xa5\x8d\xe0\xa4\xa8\xe0\xa5\x87 \xe0\xa4\xaa\xe0\xa5\x8d\xe0\xa4\xb0\xe0\xa4\xbf\xe0\xa4\x82\xe0\xa4\x9f \xe0\xa4\x95\xe0\xa4\xb0\xe0\xa4\xa8\xe0\xa5\x87 \xe0\xa4\xb2\xe0\xa4\xbe\xe0\xa4\xaf\xe0\xa4\x95 \xe0\xa4\xb8\xe0\xa5\x8d\xe0\xa4\xa5\xe0\xa4\xbe\xe0\xa4\xaf\xe0\xa5\x80 \xe0\xa4\x95\xe0\xa4\xa1\xe0\xa4\xbc\xe0\xa5\x80 \xe0\xa4\x85\xe0\xa4\xa8\xe0\xa5\x8d\xe0\xa4\xaf \xe0\xa4\xad\xe0\xa4\xbe\xe0\xa4\xb7\xe0\xa4\xbe\xe0\xa4\x8f\xe0\xa4\x81 ar : \xd8\xa7\xd9\x84\xd8\xb5\xd9\x81\xd8\xad\xd8\xa9 S'Kezd\xc5\x91lap - Wikitravel Kezd\xc5\x91lap A Wikitravelb\xc5\x91l Ugr\xc3\xa1s: navig\xc3\xa1ci\xc3\xb3 , keres\xc3\xa9s A Wikitravel egy olyan projekt, melynek c\xc3\xa9lja egy szabadon hozz\xc3\xa1f\xc3\xa9rhet\xc5\x91 , a vil\xc3\xa1g minden r\xc3\xa9sz\xc3\xa9t bemutat\xc3\xb3 \xc3\xbatikalauz l\xc3\xa9trehoz\xc3\xa1sa. A magyar v\xc3\xa1ltozat 2006 okt\xc3\xb3ber\xc3\xa9ben indult, \xc3\xa9s jelenleg 676 sz\xc3\xb3cikket tartalmaz. L\xc3\xa1togasd meg a Seg\xc3\xadts\xc3\xa9get vagy a Az els\xc5\x91 l\xc3\xa9p\xc3\xa9sek oldalt, hogy azonnal elkezdhesd a Wikitravel szerkeszt\xc3\xa9s\xc3\xa9t. Ha seg\xc3\xadteni szeretn\xc3\xa9l, l\xc3\xa1togasd meg a tennival\xc3\xb3k list\xc3\xa1j\xc3\xa1t . Magyarorsz\xc3\xa1g Eur\xc3\xb3pa \xc3\x89szak-Amerika K\xc3\xb6z\xc3\xa9p-Amerika & Karib-szigetek D\xc3\xa9l-Amerika Afrika \xc3\x81zsia Ausztr\xc3\xa1lia \xc3\xa9s \xc3\x93ce\xc3\xa1nia K\xc3\xb6zel-Kelet Tov\xc3\xa1bbi \xc3\xbatic\xc3\xa9lok Vil\xc3\xa1g Afrika Egyiptom, Kenya, Marokk\xc3\xb3, Seychelle-szigetek , D\xc3\xa9l-afrikai K\xc3\xb6zt\xc3\xa1rsas\xc3\xa1g, Tun\xc3\xa9zia, tov\xc3\xa1bbi cikkek... \xc3\x81zsia India, Indon\xc3\xa9zia, Jap\xc3\xa1n, K\xc3\xadna, Szingap\xc3\xbar, Thaif\xc3\xb6ld, tov\xc3\xa1bbi cikkek... Ausztr\xc3\xa1lia \xc3\xa9s \xc3\x93ce\xc3\xa1nia Ausztr\xc3\xa1lia, Sydney, \xc3\x9aj-Z\xc3\xa9land, tov\xc3\xa1bbi cikkek... K\xc3\xb6zel-Kelet Egyes\xc3\xbclt Arab Em\xc3\xadrs\xc3\xa9gek, Jord\xc3\xa1nia, Ir\xc3\xa1n, Izrael, T\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xb6korsz\xc3\xa1g, tov\xc3\xa1bbi cikkek... \xc3\x89szak-Amerika Egyes\xc3\xbclt \xc3\x81llamok, Kanada, Mexik\xc3\xb3, New York, tov\xc3\xa1bbi cikkek... Latin-Amerika Braz\xc3\xadlia, Costa Rica, Dominikai K\xc3\xb6zt\xc3\xa1rsas\xc3\xa1g, Karib-szigetek, Kuba, tov\xc3\xa1bbi cikkek... Eur\xc3\xb3pa Bulg\xc3\xa1ria, Franciaorsz\xc3\xa1g, G\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xb6gorsz\xc3\xa1g, Horv\xc3\xa1torsz\xc3\xa1g, London, Olaszorsz\xc3\xa1g, N\xc3\xa9metorsz\xc3\xa1g, Spanyolorsz\xc3\xa1g, tov\xc3\xa1bbi cikkek... \xc3\x9cnnepek \xc3\xa9s esem\xc3\xa9nyek \xc3\x9cnnepek \xc3\xa9s esem\xc3\xa9nyek m\xc3\xa1rcius h\xc3\xb3napban , tov\xc3\xa1bbi cikkek... Sz\xc3\xb3szedetek Angol , Francia , N\xc3\xa9met , Olasz , Spanyol , tov\xc3\xa1bbi sz\xc3\xb3szedetek... Magyarorsz\xc3\xa1g Balaton , Budapest , Debrecen , Gy\xc5\x91r , Miskolc , P\xc3\xa9cs , Szeged , tov\xc3\xa1bbi cikkek... K\xc3\xb6z\xc3\xa9p-Eur\xc3\xb3pa Ausztria , B\xc3\xa9cs , Belgr\xc3\xa1d , Csehorsz\xc3\xa1g , Erd\xc3\xa9ly , K\xc3\xa1rp\xc3\xa1talja , Magas-T\xc3\xa1tra , Pozsony , Pr\xc3\xa1ga , Szlov\xc3\xa1kia , Vajdas\xc3\xa1g Egy\xc3\xa9b nyelvek Catal\xc3\xa0 (Katal\xc3\xa1n) , Deutsch (N\xc3\xa9met) , English (Angol) , Esperanto (Eszperant\xc3\xb3) , Espa\xc3\xb1ol (Spanyol) , Fran\xc3\xa7ais (Francia) , \xd7\xa2\xd7\x91\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\xaa (H\xc3\xa9ber) , \xe0\xa4\xb9\xe0\xa4\xbf\xe0\xa4\xa8\xe0\xa5\x8d\xe0\xa4\xa6\xe0\xa5\x80 (Hindi) , Italiano (Olasz) \xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Jap\xc3\xa1n) , Nederlands (Holland) , Polski (Lengyel) , Portugu\xc3\xaas (Portug\xc3\xa1l) , Rom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Rom\xc3\xa1n) , \xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Orosz) Suomi (Finn) , Svenska (Sv\xc3\xa9d) nyelv\xc5\xb1 Wikitravel. A lap eredeti c\xc3\xadme: \xe2\x80\x9e http://wikitravel.org/hu/Kezd%C5%91lap \xe2\x80\x9d Szem\xc3\xa9lyes eszk\xc3\xb6z\xc3\xb6k Bejelentkez\xc3\xa9s / fi\xc3\xb3k l\xc3\xa9trehoz\xc3\xa1sa Bejelentkez\xc3\xa9s OpenID-vel N\xc3\xa9vterek Sz\xc3\xb3cikk Vitalap V\xc3\xa1ltoz\xc3\xb3k N\xc3\xa9zetek Olvas\xc3\xa1s A lap forr\xc3\xa1sa Lapt\xc3\xb6rt\xc3\xa9net M\xc5\xb1veletek Keres\xc3\xa9s Navig\xc3\xa1ci\xc3\xb3 Kezd\xc5\x91lap K\xc3\xb6z\xc3\xb6ss\xc3\xa9gi port\xc3\xa1l Friss v\xc3\xa1ltoztat\xc3\xa1sok Lap tal\xc3\xa1lomra Seg\xc3\xadts\xc3\xa9g Wikitravel Shared Wikitravel Extra Docents About Docent Eszk\xc3\xb6z\xc3\xb6k Mi hivatkozik erre Kapcsol\xc3\xb3d\xc3\xb3 v\xc3\xa1ltoztat\xc3\xa1sok Speci\xc3\xa1lis lapok Nyomtathat\xc3\xb3 v\xc3\xa1ltozat \xc3\x81lland\xc3\xb3 link M\xc3\xa1s nyelveken ca : P\xc3\xa0gina principal de : Hauptseite en : Main Page eo : \xc4\x88efpa\xc4\x9do es : Portada fi : Etusivu fr : Accueil he : \xd7\xa2\xd7\x9e\xd7\x95\xd7\x93 \xd7\xa8\xd7\x90\xd7\xa9\xd7\x99 hi : \xe0\xa4\xae\xe0\xa5\x81\xe0\xa4\x96\xe0\xa4\xaa\xe0\xa5\x83\xe0\xa4\xb7\xe0\xa5\x8d\xe0\xa4\xa0 it : Pagina principale ja : \xe3\x83\xa1\xe3\x82\xa4\xe3\x83\xb3\xe3\x83\x9a\xe3\x83\xbc\xe3\x82\xb8 nl : Hoofdpagina pl : Strona g\xc5\x82\xc3\xb3wna pt : P\xc3\xa1gina principal ro : Portal ru : \xd0\x97\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb3\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb2\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb0\xd1\x8f \xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb8\xd1\x86\xd0\xb0 sv : Huvudsida zh : \xe9\xa6\x96\xe9\xa1\xb5 egy\xc3\xa9b oldalak Wikipedia Open Directory A lap utols\xc3\xb3 m\xc3\xb3dos\xc3\xadt\xc3\xa1sa: 2008. febru\xc3\xa1r 1., 11:12 A tartalom a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 felt\xc3\xa9telei mellett haszn\xc3\xa1lhat\xc3\xb3. S'Pagina principale - Wikitravel Aiuta Wikitravel a crescere grazie al tuo contributo: scrivi un articolo! Ecco come . Pagina principale Da Wikitravel. Vai a: navigazione , ricerca Wikitravel \xc3\xa8 un progetto per creare una libera , completa, aggiornata e modificabile guida turistica mondiale . Fino a questo momento sono state aperte 4.892 pagine e altre vengono continuamente scritte dai Wikitravellers di tutto il mondo. Guarda la pagina di aiuto affinch\xc3\xa8 anche tu possa editare pagine del progetto. Africa Asia Australasia & Oceania Europa Medio Oriente Nord America Sud America America Centrale & Caraibi Altre destinazioni Tematiche Turistiche & Frasari Destinazione del mese India - L\'India \xc3\xa8 la pi\xc3\xb9 grande nazione del subcontinente indiano; \xc3\xa8 al settimo posto al mondo per superficie e, in tutto il mondo, \xc3\xa8 seconda solo alla Cina per numero di abitanti. L\'India si vanta di essere la pi\xc3\xb9 grande repubblica democratica del mondo. \xc3\x88 anche un paese assai diversificato non solo dal punto di vista geografico e climatico, ma anche da quello etnico e culturale. Marzo \xc3\xa8 il mese dell\'Holi, il festival dei colori, festeggiato dagli Hindu. In realt\xc3\xa0 coinvolge tutti, i passanti godono dei colori e vengono coinvolti nelle celebrazioni... Marzo \xc3\xa8 dunque uno dei periodi pi\xc3\xb9 adatti per visitare questo meraviglioso Paese. Per saperne di pi\xc3\xb9 Fuori dal sentiero battuto Modena - La citt\xc3\xa0 offre al turista monumenti e musei di grande pregio e importanza storico-artistica. Il Duomo, capolavoro dello stile romanico, la Torre Civica (c.d. Ghirlandina) e Piazza Grande, cuore della citt\xc3\xa0, sono state dichiarate dall\'UNESCO patrimonio mondiale dell\'umanit\xc3\xa0. Modena \xc3\xa8 conosciuta in tutto il mondo anche per la sua tradizione gastronomica, per la gustosit\xc3\xa0 dei suoi piatti tipici e per la ricca offerta di prodotti semplici e genuini, dovuta alla sua fortunata posizione al centro della ricca Pianura Padana. Modena Notizie e Eventi in Italia e all\' estero Milano dal 21 marzo in poi Cibo a regola d\'arte: i migliori cuochi italiani si incontrano alla Triennale e al Museo della Scienza e della Tecnica di Milano. Una bellissima occasione per unire cibo e arte. Fonte: http://www.ciboaregoladarte.it leggi le News Londra 9 marzo - 14 luglio 2013 I tesori della corte: in mostra al Victoria&Albert Museum, 150 fra gioielli, ritratti e beni di lusso appartenuti ai Tudor, agli Stuart, e agli zar russi. Fonte: http://www.vam.ac.uk/content/exhibitions/treasures-of-the-royal-courts/ leggi le News Roma 6 marzo - 21 luglio 2013 HELMUT NEWTON - White Women, Sleepless Nights, Big Nudes. In mostra a Roma a Palazzo delle Esposizioni 200 immagini di uno dei fotografi pi\xc3\xb9 emblematici del XX secolo. Dopo il Museum of Fine Arts di Houston e il Museum f\xc3\xbcr Fotografie di Berlino, il Palazzo delle Esposizioni di Roma accoglie dal 6 marzo al 21 luglio 2013, per la sua unica tappa italiana, la mostra White Women, Sleepless Nights, Big Nudes che presenta 200 immagini di Helmut Newton, uno dei fotografi pi\xc3\xb9 importanti del XX secolo. Fonte: http://www.clponline.it leggi le News Altre Lingue Pi\xc3\xb9 di 1000 articoli Espa\xc3\xb1ol , Fran\xc3\xa7ais , Italiano , \xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e , Nederlands , Portugu\xc3\xaas , \xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 , Suomi , Svenska Al di sotto: Catal\xc3\xa0 (Catalano) , \xd8\xa7\xd9\x84\xd8\xb9\xd8\xb1\xd8\xa8\xd9\x8a\xd8\xa9 Catal\xc3\xa0 , Esperanto , \xd7\xa2\xd7\x91\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\xaa , \xe0\xa4\xb9\xe0\xa4\xbf\xe0\xa4\xa8\xe0\xa5\x8d\xe0\xa4\xa6\xe0\xa5\x80 , Magyar , \xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 , Polski , Rom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 , \xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 , Estratto da " http://wikitravel.org/it/Pagina_principale " Strumenti personali Entra / Registrati Login con OpenID Namespace Articolo Discussione Varianti Visite Leggi S'Wikitravel:Wikitravellers - Wikitravel Aiuta Wikitravel a crescere grazie al tuo contributo: scrivi un articolo! Ecco come . Wikitravel:Wikitravellers Da Wikitravel. Vai a: navigazione , ricerca "[Squadra] ricercata per un viaggio pericoloso. Piccolo salario. Grande freddo. Lunghi mesi d\'oscurit\xc3\xa0 completa. Pericoli costanti. Ritornare \xc3\xa8 pressoch\xc3\xa8 impossibile. Onore e gloria in caso di successo." Poster per la spedizione Antartica del 1914 di HMS Endurance I Wikitravellers sono i membri di una comunit\xc3\xa0 mondiale di contributori di Wikitravel . Wikitravel non \xc3\xa8 esistita abbastanza a lungo per dire che tipo di persone sono i Wikitravellers, ma \xc3\xa8 facile dire che coloro che collaborano al progetto amano il viaggio in generale, oltre che dividere la propria conoscenza con gli altri. I Wikitravellers non sono un\'organizzazione segreta speciale o un gruppo chiuso. Noi siamo gente come te, interessata ai viaggi e volenterosa di condividere quello che sappiamo. Anche tu puoi diventare un Wikitraveller proprio ora ! Abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto per rendere questo progetto un successo. Abbiamo molto da fare, tutto quello che puoi fare ci fa progredire! Vedi anche: Lista di Wikitravellers per locazione e Lista degli amministratori Estratto da " http://wikitravel.org/it/Wikitravel:Wikitravellers " Strumenti personali Entra / Registrati Login con OpenID Namespace Pagina di servizio Discussione Varianti Visite Leggi Modifica Visualizza cronologia Azioni Ricerca Navigazione Pagina principale Ultime modifiche Una pagina a caso Bar dei viaggiatori Aiuto Wikitravel Shared Wikitravel Extra Docenti dell\'articolo Riguardo i docenti Strumenti Puntano qui Modifiche correlate Pagine speciali Versione stampabile Link permanente Altre lingue ca : Wikiviatgers de : Wikitraveller en : Wikitravellers es : Wikiviajeros fi : Wikimatkaajat fr : Wikivoyageurs ja : \xe3\x82\xa6\xe3\x82\xa3\xe3\x82\xad\xe3\x83\x88\xe3\x83\xa9\xe3\x83\x99\xe3\x83\xa9\xe3\x83\xbc ko : Wikitravellers nl : Wikitravellers pt : Wikiviajantes ro : Wikic\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83tori ru : \xd0\x92\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbf\xd1\x83\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5\xd1\x88\xd0\xb5\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbd\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 sv : Wikiresen\xc3\xa4rer zh : \xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe8\x80\x85 Ultima modifica per la pagina: 07:13, 25 nov 2010. S"\xec\x9e\x90\xec\x9c\xa0\xeb\xa1\xad\xea\xb3\xa0 \xec\x84\xb8\xea\xb3\x84\xec\xa0\x81\xec\x9d\xb8 \xec\x97\xac\xed\x96\x89 \xea\xb0\x80\xec\x9d\xb4\xeb\x93\x9c - Wikitravel \xeb\x8c\x80\xeb\xac\xb8 Wikitravel \xec\x9d\xb4\xeb\x8f\x99: \xeb\x91\x98\xeb\x9f\xac\xeb\xb3\xb4\xea\xb8\xb0 , \xec\xb0\xbe\xea\xb8\xb0 \xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 Wikitravel \xec\x97\x90 \xec\x98\xa4\xec\x8b\xa0 \xea\xb2\x83\xec\x9d\x84 \xed\x99\x98\xec\x98\x81\xed\x95\xa9\xeb\x8b\x88\xeb\x8b\xa4. S"Wikitravel:Wikitravellers - Wikitravel Wikitravel:Wikitravellers Wikitravel \xec\x9d\xb4\xeb\x8f\x99: \xeb\x91\x98\xeb\x9f\xac\xeb\xb3\xb4\xea\xb8\xb0 , \xec\xb0\xbe\xea\xb8\xb0 \xec\x9d\xb4 \xeb\xac\xb8\xec\x84\x9c\xeb\x8a\x94 \xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 \xec\x9c\x84\xed\x82\xa4\xed\x8a\xb8\xeb\x9e\x98\xeb\xb8\x94\xec\x9d\x98 \xec\xa0\x95\xec\xb1\x85\xec\x9d\xb4\xeb\x82\x98 \xec\xa7\x80\xec\xb9\xa8 \xeb\x93\xb1\xec\x9c\xbc\xeb\xa1\x9c \xec\xa0\x9c\xec\x95\x88\xeb\x90\x9c \xec\x83\x81\xed\x83\x9c\xec\x9e\x85\xeb\x8b\x88\xeb\x8b\xa4. \xec\xa0\x9c\xec\x95\x88 \xeb\x82\xb4\xec\x9a\xa9\xec\x9d\x80 \xeb\x8d\x94\xec\x9a\xb1 \xec\xb6\x94\xea\xb0\x80\xc2\xb7\xeb\xb3\xb4\xec\xb6\xa9\xc2\xb7\xec\x88\x98\xec\xa0\x95\xeb\x90\xa0 \xec\x88\x98 \xec\x9e\x88\xec\x9c\xbc\xeb\xa9\xb0, \xec\xa0\x9c\xec\x95\x88\xeb\x90\x9c \xeb\x82\xb4\xec\x9a\xa9\xec\x9d\x80 \xed\x86\xa0\xeb\xa1\xa0\xeb\x9e\x80 \xec\x97\x90\xec\x84\x9c \xea\xb3\xb5\xec\x8b\x9d\xec\xa0\x81\xec\x9d\xb8 \xec\xb1\x84\xed\x83\x9d\xec\x9d\x84 \xec\x9c\x84\xed\x95\x9c \xec\xb4\x9d\xec\x9d\x98 \xeb\xa5\xbc \xeb\xaa\xa8\xec\x9c\xbc\xeb\x8a\x94 \xea\xb3\xbc\xec\xa0\x95 \xec\xa4\x91\xec\x97\x90 \xec\x9e\x88\xec\x8a\xb5\xeb\x8b\x88\xeb\x8b\xa4. \xec\x9d\xb4 \xeb\xac\xb8\xec\x84\x9c\xeb\x8a\x94 \xed\x98\x84\xec\x9e\xac \xec\xa0\x81\xec\x9a\xa9\xeb\x90\x98\xea\xb3\xa0 \xec\x9e\x88\xeb\x8a\x94 \xec\xa0\x95\xec\xb1\x85\xec\x9d\xb4\xeb\x82\x98 \xec\xa7\x80\xec\xb9\xa8\xec\x9d\xb4 \xec\x95\x84\xeb\x8b\x88\xeb\xaf\x80\xeb\xa1\x9c, \xec\x9d\xb4 \xeb\xac\xb8\xec\x84\x9c\xeb\xa5\xbc \xec\xb0\xb8\xec\xa1\xb0\xed\x95\x98\xea\xb1\xb0\xeb\x82\x98 \xeb\xa7\x81\xed\x81\xac\xed\x95\xa0 \xeb\x95\x8c\xec\x97\x90\xeb\x8a\x94 \xec\xa0\x95\xec\xb1\x85\xec\x9d\xb4\xeb\x82\x98 \xec\xa7\x80\xec\xb9\xa8\xec\x9d\xb4\xeb\x9d\xbc\xea\xb3\xa0 \xea\xb8\xb0\xec\x88\xa0\xed\x95\x98\xec\xa7\x80 \xec\x95\x8a\xec\x95\x84\xec\x95\xbc \xed\x95\xa9\xeb\x8b\x88\xeb\x8b\xa4. \xe2\x80\x9c\xec\x9c\x84\xed\x97\x98\xed\x95\x9c \xec\x97\xac\xed\x96\x89\xec\x9d\x84 \xed\x95\xa0 \xec\x8a\xb9\xeb\xac\xb4\xec\x9b\x90 \xea\xb5\xac\xed\x95\xa8. \xec\x96\xbc\xeb\xa7\x88 \xec\x95\x88 \xeb\x90\x98\xeb\x8a\x94 \xeb\xb3\xb4\xec\x88\x98. \xec\x95\x94\xed\x9d\x91\xec\x9d\x98 \xeb\x82\xa0\xeb\x93\xa4. \xeb\x81\x8a\xec\x9e\x84\xec\x97\x86\xeb\x8a\x94 \xec\x9c\x84\xed\x97\x98. \xec\x83\x9d\xed\x99\x98 \xeb\xb3\xb4\xec\xa6\x9d \xec\x97\x86\xec\x9d\x8c. \xec\x84\xb1\xea\xb3\xb5\xed\x95\xa0 \xea\xb2\xbd\xec\x9a\xb0 \xeb\xaa\x85\xec\x98\x88\xec\x99\x80 \xec\xb9\xad\xec\xb0\xac\xec\x9d\x84 \xec\x96\xbb\xeb\x8a\x94\xeb\x8b\xa4.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x94\x80 1914\xeb\x85\x84 \xec\x9d\xb8\xeb\x93\x80\xeb\x9f\xb0\xec\x8a\xa4\xed\x98\xb8\xec\x9d\x98 \xeb\x82\xa8\xea\xb7\xb9 \xeb\x8c\x80\xeb\xa5\x99 \xed\x83\x90\xed\x97\x98\xeb\x8c\x80\xec\x9b\x90 \xeb\xaa\xa8\xec\xa7\x91 \xed\x8f\xac\xec\x8a\xa4\xed\x84\xb0\xec\x97\x90\xec\x84\x9c Wikitraveller \xeb\x8a\x94 Wikitravel\xec\x97\x90 \xec\xb0\xb8\xea\xb0\x80\xed\x95\x98\xeb\x8a\x94 \xec\x82\xac\xeb\x9e\x8c\xeb\x93\xa4\xec\x9d\x84 \xeb\xa7\x90\xed\x95\xa9\xeb\x8b\x88\xeb\x8b\xa4. Wikitravel\xec\x9d\x80 \xec\x95\x84\xec\xa7\x81\xeb\x8f\x84 Wikitraveller\xeb\x93\xa4\xec\x9d\xb4 \xec\x96\xb4\xeb\x96\xa4 \xec\x82\xac\xeb\x9e\x8c\xeb\x93\xa4\xec\x9d\xb8\xea\xb0\x80\xeb\x9d\xbc\xea\xb3\xa0 \xed\x95\x98\xeb\x8a\x94 \xeb\xac\xb8\xec\xa0\x9c\xec\x97\x90 \xeb\x8c\x80\xed\x95\x9c \xea\xb0\x80\xec\x9e\xa5 \xec\xa0\x81\xec\xa0\x88\xed\x95\x9c \xeb\x8b\xb5\xec\x9d\x84 \xec\xb0\xbe\xec\x95\x84\xeb\x82\xb4\xec\xa7\x80 \xec\x95\x8a\xea\xb3\xa0 \xec\x95\x8a\xec\x8a\xb5\xeb\x8b\x88\xeb\x8b\xa4\xeb\xa7\x8c, Wikitravel\xec\x97\x90 \xec\x97\xb4\xec\xa4\x91\xed\x95\x98\xea\xb3\xa0 \xec\x9e\x88\xeb\x8a\x94 \xec\x82\xac\xeb\x9e\x8c\xeb\x93\xa4\xec\x9d\xb4 \xeb\xaa\xa8\xeb\x91\x90 \xec\x97\xac\xed\x96\x89\xec\x97\x90 \xea\xb4\x80\xec\x8b\xac\xec\x9d\x84 \xea\xb0\x96\xea\xb3\xa0 \xec\x9e\x88\xeb\x8a\x94 \xea\xb2\x83, \xea\xb7\xb8\xeb\xa6\xac\xea\xb3\xa0 \xea\xb7\xb8 \xec\xa7\x80\xec\x8b\x9d\xec\x9d\x84 \xea\xb3\xb5\xec\x9c\xa0\xed\x95\x98\xeb\x8a\x94 \xea\xb2\x83\xec\x97\x90\xeb\x8a\x94 \xed\x8a\xb9\xed\x9e\x88 \xec\x97\xb4\xec\x8b\xac\xec\x9d\xb8 \xea\xb2\x83\xec\x9d\x80 \xed\x99\x95\xec\x8b\xa4\xed\x95\xa9\xeb\x8b\x88\xeb\x8b\xa4. Wikitravel\xec\x9d\x80 \xec\x96\xb4\xeb\x96\xa4 \xea\xb2\x83\xec\x9c\xbc\xeb\xa1\x9c\xeb\xa7\x8c \xeb\x90\xa0 \xec\x88\x98 \xec\x9e\x88\xeb\x8b\xa4\xeb\x8a\x94 \xea\xb2\x83\xec\x9d\xb4 \xec\x95\x84\xeb\x8b\x88\xea\xb3\xa0, Wikitravel\xec\x97\x90 \xec\xb0\xb8\xec\x97\xac\xed\x95\x98\xea\xb8\xb0 \xec\x9c\x84\xed\x95\x9c \xec\xa0\x9c\xed\x95\x9c\xeb\x8f\x84 \xec\x97\x86\xec\x8a\xb5\xeb\x8b\x88\xeb\x8b\xa4. \xec\x9a\xb0\xeb\xa6\xac\xeb\x8a\x94 \xeb\x8b\xb9\xec\x8b\xa0\xea\xb3\xbc \xea\xb0\x99\xec\x9d\xb4 \xec\x97\xac\xed\x96\x89\xec\x9d\x84 \xec\xa2\x8b\xec\x95\x84\xed\x95\x98\xea\xb3\xa0, \xea\xb7\xb8\xeb\xa6\xac\xea\xb3\xa0 \xeb\x8b\xb9\xec\x8b\xa0\xea\xb3\xbc \xea\xb0\x99\xec\x9d\xb4 \xea\xb7\xb8 \xec\xa7\x80\xec\x8b\x9d\xec\x9d\x84 \xea\xb3\xb5\xec\x9c\xa0\xed\x95\x98\xeb\xa0\xa4\xea\xb3\xa0 \xed\x95\x98\xea\xb3\xa0 \xec\x9e\x88\xec\x9d\x84 \xeb\xbf\x90\xec\x9e\x85\xeb\x8b\x88\xeb\x8b\xa4.\xe3\x80\x80\xeb\x8b\xb9\xec\x8b\xa0\xec\x9d\x80 \xec\xa7\x80\xea\xb8\x88\xec\x9d\xb4\xeb\x9d\xbc\xeb\x8f\x84 Wikitravel\xec\x97\x90 \xec\xb0\xb8\xea\xb0\x80\xed\x95\xb4, Wikitraveller\xea\xb0\x80 \xeb\x90\xa0 \xec\x88\x98 \xec\x9e\x88\xec\x8a\xb5\xeb\x8b\x88\xeb\x8b\xa4.\xec\x9a\xb0\xeb\xa6\xac\xeb\x8a\x94 \xec\x9d\xb4 Wikitravel\xec\x9d\xb4\xeb\x9d\xbc\xea\xb3\xa0 \xed\x95\x98\xeb\x8a\x94 \xed\x94\x84\xeb\xa1\x9c\xec\xa0\x9d\xed\x8a\xb8\xec\x9d\x98 \xec\x84\xb1\xea\xb3\xb5\xec\x9d\x84 \xec\x9c\x84\xed\x95\xb4 \xeb\x8b\xb9\xec\x8b\xa0\xec\x9d\x98 \xeb\x8f\x84\xec\x9b\x80\xec\x9d\x84 \xed\x95\x84\xec\x9a\x94\xeb\xa1\x9c \xed\x95\x98\xea\xb3\xa0 \xec\x9e\x88\xec\x8a\xb5\xeb\x8b\x88\xeb\x8b\xa4! S'Strona g\xc5\x82\xc3\xb3wna - Wikitravel - Przewodnik turystyczny Pom\xc3\xb3\xc5\xbc wybogaci\xc4\x87 Wikitravel! Dowiedz si\xc4\x99 jak Strona g\xc5\x82\xc3\xb3wna Z Wikitravel, http://wikitravel.org/ Skocz do: nawigacji , wyszukiwania Wikitravel to otwarty i darmowy przewodnik turystyczny tworzony przez Wikipodr\xc3\xb3\xc5\xbcnik\xc3\xb3w z ca\xc5\x82ego \xc5\x9bwiata. Zajrzyj do pomocy , je\xc5\x9bli chcia\xc5\x82by\xc5\x9b si\xc4\x99 do\xc5\x82\xc4\x85czy\xc4\x87, ale nie wiesz od czego zacz\xc4\x85\xc4\x87. Mo\xc5\xbcesz te\xc5\xbc zajrze\xc4\x87 do naszego pubu podr\xc3\xb3\xc5\xbcnika \xe2\x80\x93 podyskutuj z osobami tworz\xc4\x85cymi serwis. W polskoj\xc4\x99zycznym Wikitravel mamy ju\xc5\xbc ponad 2544 artyku\xc5\x82\xc3\xb3w. Afryka Azja Australia i Oceania Europa Bliski Wsch\xc3\xb3d Ameryka P\xc3\xb3\xc5\x82nocna Ameryka Po\xc5\x82udniowa Ameryka \xc5\x9arodkowa i Karaiby Artyku\xc5\x82y i Rozm\xc3\xb3wki Odkrycie miesi\xc4\x85ca Zimowe szale\xc5\x84stwo na stokach Dolina Montafon to jeden z najpopularniejscych o\xc5\x9brodk\xc3\xb3w w regionie Vorarlberg . Sk\xc5\x82ada si\xc4\x99 z sze\xc5\x9bciu teren\xc3\xb3w narciarskich, kt\xc3\xb3re \xc5\x82\xc4\x85czy system wsp\xc3\xb3lnych ski-pass\xc3\xb3w . Narciarze maj\xc4\x85 do dyspozycji 222 km tras na wysoko\xc5\x9bci od 650 do prawie 2400 m n.p.m. W sumie dzia\xc5\x82aj\xc4\x85 tu 62 wyci\xc4\x85gi i kolejki. Kristberg to wymarzone miejsce dla nowicjuszy oraz rodzin z ma\xc5\x82ymi dzie\xc4\x87mi. Z malutkiego terenu narciarskiego Grabs, na kt\xc3\xb3rym pracuje najstarszy austriacki wyci\xc4\x85g krzese\xc5\x82kowy, mo\xc5\xbcna zjecha\xc4\x87 w dolin\xc4\x99 \xc5\x9brednio trudn\xc4\x85 tras\xc4\x85. Schafberg jest r\xc3\xb3wnie\xc5\xbc terenem \xc5\x82agodnym, a na Silvretta Nova ka\xc5\xbcdy znajdzie tras\xc4\x99 odpowiedni\xc4\x85 do swoich wymaga\xc5\x84. wi\xc4\x99cej Polskie odkrycie Sandomierz \xe2\x80\x93miasto w wojew\xc3\xb3dztwie \xc5\x9bwi\xc4\x99tokrzyskim , w powiecie sandomierskim, po\xc5\x82o\xc5\xbcone nad rzek\xc4\x85 Wis\xc5\x82\xc4\x85, na kilku wzg\xc3\xb3rzach, na kraw\xc4\x99dzi Wy\xc5\xbcyny Sandomierskiej. Jedno z najstarszych polskich miast, z zachowan\xc4\x85 star\xc3\xb3wk\xc4\x85. Warto zobaczy\xc4\x87 zamek kr\xc3\xb3lewski wzniesiony w XIV w. przez Kazimierza Wielkiego. wi\xc4\x99cej Przewodnik Wikitravel Afryka Algieria , Wybrze\xc5\xbce Ko\xc5\x9bci S\xc5\x82oniowej , Egipt , Komory , Kenia , Libia , Madagaskar , Maroko , Mauritius , Namibia , Senegal , Seszele , RPA , Tanzania , Tunezja , wi\xc4\x99cej... Azja Gruzja , Indie , Iran , Japonia , Jordania , Kazachstan , Nepal Singapur , Sri Lanka , Syria , Tad\xc5\xbcykistan , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan , wi\xc4\x99cej... Oceania Sydney , Kiribati , Nauru , Niue , Nowa Kaledonia , Nowa Zelandia , wi\xc4\x99cej... Bliski Wsch\xc3\xb3d Zjednoczone Emiraty Arabskie , Jordania , Iran , Izrael , Liban , Oman , Turcja , Jemen , wi\xc4\x99cej... Ameryka P\xc3\xb3\xc5\x82nocna Kanada , Stany Zjednoczone , Meksyk , Las Vegas , wi\xc4\x99cej... Ameryka \xc5\x9arodkowa i Karaiby Belize , Kostaryka , Gwatemala , wi\xc4\x99cej... Antyle Holenderskie , Bahamy , Kuba , Dominikana , Saint Kitts i Nevis , Trynidad i Tobago , wi\xc4\x99cej... Ameryka Po\xc5\x82udniowa Argentyna , Brazylia , Chile , Peru , wi\xc4\x99cej... Europa Austria , Malta , Francja , Moskwa , Ukraina , Litwa , Macedonia , Grecja , Hiszpania , Szwecja , Rumunia , wi\xc4\x99cej... Polska Warszawa , Krak\xc3\xb3w , Gda\xc5\x84sk wi\xc4\x99cej... Artyku\xc5\x82y Podr\xc3\xb3\xc5\xbce poci\xc4\x85giem , Podr\xc3\xb3\xc5\xbce z dzieckiem wi\xc4\x99cej... Rozm\xc3\xb3wki Rozm\xc3\xb3wki angielskie , Rozm\xc3\xb3wki niemieckie , Rozm\xc3\xb3wki szwedzkie , Rozm\xc3\xb3wki du\xc5\x84skie , Rozm\xc3\xb3wki hiszpa\xc5\x84skie wi\xc4\x99cej... Kalejdoskop Prohibicja nadal obowi\xc4\x85zuje w niekt\xc3\xb3rych hrabstwach w USA . W innych j\xc4\x99zykach Powy\xc5\xbcej 1000 artyku\xc5\x82\xc3\xb3w : Deutsch (Niemiecki) , English (Angielski) , Espa\xc3\xb1ol (Hiszpa\xc5\x84ski) , Italiano (W\xc5\x82oski) , Fran\xc3\xa7ais (Francuski) , \xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japo\xc5\x84ski) , Nederlands (Niderlandzki) , Polski , Portugu\xc3\xaas (Portugalski) , \xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Rosyjski) , Suomi (Finlandzki) , Svenska (Szwedzki) Poni\xc5\xbcej : Catal\xc3\xa0 , \xd8\xa7\xd9\x84\xd8\xb9\xd8\xb1\xd8\xa8\xd9\x8a\xd8\xa9 Catal\xc3\xa0 , Esperanto , \xd7\xa2\xd7\x91\xd7\xa8\xd7\x99\xd7\xaa , \xe0\xa4\xb9\xe0\xa4\xbf\xe0\xa4\xa8\xe0\xa5\x8d\xe0\xa4\xa6\xe0\xa5\x80 (Hindi) , Magyar (W\xc4\x99gierski) , \xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 , Rom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Rumu\xc5\x84ski) , \xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 \xe2\x80\x94 Nowa wersja! S'P\xc3\xa1gina principal - Wikitravel Contribua para um artigo e ajude o wikitravel a crescer! Aprenda como . P\xc3\xa1gina principal Da Wikitravel Ir para: navega\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o , pesquisa O Wikitravel \xc3\xa9 um projeto que visa criar um guia mundial de viagens livre , completo, atualizado e dispon\xc3\xadvel para todos. At\xc3\xa9 o momento, temos 2 891 guias de destinos e outros artigos escritos e editados por Wikiviajantes de todo o mundo. Veja a p\xc3\xa1gina de ajuda para saber como voc\xc3\xaa mesmo pode criar novas p\xc3\xa1ginas e editar as existentes j\xc3\xa1 ! \xc3\x81frica \xc3\x81sia & Oceania Europa Oriente M\xc3\xa9dio Am\xc3\xa9rica do Norte Am\xc3\xa9rica do Sul Am\xc3\xa9rica Central & Caribe Outros destinos Roteiros & dicas de viagem Guias de Conversa\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o Destino do m\xc3\xaas Capital da R\xc3\xbassia entre 1712 e 1917, S\xc3\xa3o Petersburgo ou Sampetersburgo (\xd0\xa1\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbd\xd0\xba\xd1\x82-\xd0\x9f\xd0\xb5\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5\xd1\x80\xd0\xb1\xd1\x83\xcc\x81\xd1\x80\xd0\xb3, Sankt-Peterburg [1] ), \xc3\xa0s margens do rio Neva, no Mar B\xc3\xa1ltico, \xc3\xa9 um dos destinos mais cobi\xc3\xa7ados do turismo mundial. Celebrada em verso e prosa por artistas como Dostoievsky, Pushkin e Gogol, \xc3\xa9 frequentemente chamada de, somente, Petersburgo (\xd0\x9f\xd0\xb5\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5\xd1\x80\xd0\xb1\xd1\x83\xcc\x81\xd1\x80\xd0\xb3) e informalmente conhecida como Piter (\xd0\x9f\xd0\xb8\xcc\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5\xd1\x80). Entre as cidades do mundo com mais de um milh\xc3\xa3o de pessoas, S\xc3\xa3o Petersburgo \xc3\xa9 a que est\xc3\xa1 mais a Norte. O centro hist\xc3\xb3rico da cidade e o grupo de monumentos constituem patrim\xc3\xb4nio mundial da UNESCO. ( mais... ) Destino extravagante Lamu \xc3\xa9 uma cidade no Qu\xc3\xa9nia Costeiro . \xc3\x89 a principal cidade da Ilha de Lamu, que, por sua vez, faz parte do Arquip\xc3\xa9lago de Lamu. Lamu \xc3\xa9 um s\xc3\xadtio para relaxar. Deixe o telem\xc3\xb3vel e o port\xc3\xa1til em casa e deixe- se absorver pela paz local, interrompida apenas pelo zurrar dos burros e pela chamada para a ora\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o ouvida em mesquitas por toda a ilha. ( mais... ) A nossa colabora\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o do m\xc3\xaas \xc3\xa9 Calend\xc3\xa1rio de eventos e festivais Mergulhe fundo na edi\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o deste artigo e ajude-nos a escrever um guia de qualidade! Alertas de Viagem Rebeldes tomam a capital da Rep\xc3\xbablica Centro-Africana (24 de Mar\xc3\xa7o de 2013) Coreia do Sul e EUA iniciam manobras militares conjuntas (11 de Mar\xc3\xa7o de 2013) Atividade de vulc\xc3\xa3o gera alerta na Indon\xc3\xa9sia (07 de Mar\xc3\xa7o de 2013) Fortes chuvas inundam casas e causam uma morte na Maced\xc3\xb4nia (26 de Fevereiro de 2013) S\xc3\xa3o Sebasti\xc3\xa3o-SP alerta para risco de deslizamentos (26 de Fevereiro de 2013) Acontecimentos atuais e futuros Papa confirma vinda ao Brasil para Jornada Mundial da Juventude (24 de Mar\xc3\xa7o de 2013) Disney pro\xc3\xadbe menores de 14 anos desacompanhados em parques tem\xc3\xa1ticos (24 de Mar\xc3\xa7o de 2013) Toronto tem semana dedicada \xc3\xa0 m\xc3\xbasica (14 de Mar\xc3\xa7o de 2013) S\xc3\xa3o Paulo ter\xc3\xa1 Museu dedicado aos Deficientes Visuais (14 de Mar\xc3\xa7o de 2013) Autorizado aumento da tarifa das barcas para R$ 4,80 em abril(Brasil) (26 de Fevereiro de 2013) Este m\xc3\xaas 21: Dia dos Direitos Humanos - Feriado p\xc3\xbablico. Meados de Mar\xc3\xa7o: Maratona Dois Oceanos , [2] , Pen\xc3\xadnsula do Cabo . Meados de Mar\xc3\xa7o: Festival de M\xc3\xbasica de Splashy Fen , [3] , perto de Underberg , em KwaZulu-Natal Fins de Mar\xc3\xa7o: Festival de Jazz da Cidade do Cabo , [4] , Cidade do Cabo . In\xc3\xadcios de Mar\xc3\xa7o: Mardi Gras de Gays e L\xc3\xa9sbicas de Sydney [5] , Sydney , Austr\xc3\xa1lia . Meados de Mar\xc3\xa7o: Festival do Oeste , [6] , Phoenix , Arizona Por volta da segunda semana de Mar\xc3\xa7o: Festival de Filme Espanhol de M\xc3\xa1laga , M\xc3\xa1laga . - O mais importante festival de filme espanhol. 17: Dia de S\xc3\xa3o Patr\xc3\xadcio - Padroeiro da Irlanda. Existem celebra\xc3\xa7\xc3\xb5es em s\xc3\xadtios por todo o mundo, mas especialmente em Dublin , Londres , Nova Iorque , Boston e Sydney . Fins de Mar\xc3\xa7o: OppiKoppi [7] , perto de Northam - Festival de m\xc3\xbasica. S'Wikitravel:Wikiviajantes - Wikitravel Contribua para um artigo e ajude o wikitravel a crescer! Aprenda como . Wikitravel:Wikiviajantes Da Wikitravel Ir para: navega\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o , pesquisa "Procura-se tripula\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o para uma viagem perigosa. Sal\xc3\xa1rio baixo. Frio grande. Longo m\xc3\xaas de noite completa. Regresso em boa sa\xc3\xbade improv\xc3\xa1vel. Honra e gl\xc3\xb3ria no caso de sucesso." Cartaz de recrutamento para uma expedi\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o do HMS Resistance \xc3\xa0 Ant\xc3\xa1rtida em 1914. Os Wikiviajantes s\xc3\xa3o membros de uma comunidade mundial de contribuintes do Wikitravel. O guia ainda n\xc3\xa3o tem uma exist\xc3\xaancia longa o suficiente para que tenhamos uma id\xc3\xa9ia precisa de quem s\xc3\xa3o os Wikiviajantes, mas \xc3\xa9 bastante razo\xc3\xa1vel pensar que as pessoas que se interessam pelo Wikitravel se interessam por viagens, em geral, e em compartilhar seus conhecimentos com os outros, em particular. Os Wikiviajantes n\xc3\xa3o s\xc3\xa3o uma organiza\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o secreta ou um grupo restrito. S\xc3\xa3o pessoas exatamente como voc\xc3\xaa, interessados em viagens e com o desejo de compartilhar o que sabem. Voc\xc3\xaa pode se tornar um Wikiviajante agora mesmo ! Precisamos da sua ajuda para que este projeto atinja o sucesso. Temos uma longa estrada a percorrer e qualquer contribui\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o que voc\xc3\xaa traga nos colocar\xc3\xa1 mais perto de alcan\xc3\xa7ar esse objetivo. Veja tamb\xc3\xa9m\xc2\xa0: Bar dos viajantes - troque id\xc3\xa9ias com outros Wikiviajantes Wikitravel:Lista de Wikiviajantes por localiza\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o Wikitravel:Administradores Obtida de " http://wikitravel.org/pt/Wikitravel:Wikiviajantes " Ferramentas pessoais Entrar / criar conta Autentica\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o com OpenID Espa\xc3\xa7os nominais P\xc3\xa1gina do projecto Discuss\xc3\xa3o Variantes Vistas Ler Editar Ver hist\xc3\xb3rico Ac\xc3\xa7\xc3\xb5es Pesquisa Navega\xc3\xa7\xc3\xa3o P\xc3\xa1gina principal Bar dos viajantes Mudan\xc3\xa7as recentes P\xc3\xa1gina aleat\xc3\xb3ria Carregar arquivos/ reportar erros Ajuda Docentes do destino Sobre docentes caixa de ferramentas Liga\xc3\xa7\xc3\xb5es para esta p\xc3\xa1gina Altera\xc3\xa7\xc3\xb5es relacionadas P\xc3\xa1ginas especiais Vers\xc3\xa3o para impress\xc3\xa3o Link permanente Noutras l\xc3\xadnguas ca : Wikiviatgers de : Wikitraveller en : Wikitravellers es : Wikiviajeros fi : Wikimatkaajat fr : Wikivoyageurs it : Wikitravellers ja : \xe3\x82\xa6\xe3\x82\xa3\xe3\x82\xad\xe3\x83\x88\xe3\x83\xa9\xe3\x83\x99\xe3\x83\xa9\xe3\x83\xbc ko : Wikitravellers nl : Wikitravellers ro : Wikic\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83tori ru : \xd0\x92\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbf\xd1\x83\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5\xd1\x88\xd0\xb5\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbd\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 sv : Wikiresen\xc3\xa4rer zh : \xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe8\x80\x85 Esta p\xc3\xa1gina foi modificada pela \xc3\xbaltima vez \xc3\xa0s 18h32min de 24 de Maio de 2010. S'Portal - Wikitravel Portal De la Wikitravel Salt la: navigare , c\xc4\x83utare Wikitravel este un proiect ce vrea s\xc4\x83 creeze un ghid turistic mondial liber , complet \xc5\x9fi gratuit. Am \xc3\xaenceput \xc3\xaen limba rom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 pe 27 decembrie 2003, \xc5\x9fi \xc3\xaen prezent avem 570 de ghiduri de atrac\xc5\xa3ii turistice \xc5\x9fi nu numai, editate de Wikic\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83tori din \xc3\xaentreaga lume. Vede\xc5\xa3i pagina de ajutor \xc5\x9fi urm\xc4\x83ri\xc5\xa3i cum dvs. pute\xc5\xa3i edita o pagin\xc4\x83 chiar acum . Ghidul Wikitravel Europa Helsinki , Cluj-Napoca , Talin , Praga , Granada , Constan\xc5\xa3a , Rovaniemi , mai mult... America de Nord New York , San Diego , Los Angeles , SUA , mai mult... Africa Algeria , Cairo , Windhoek , Coasta de Filde\xc5\x9f , Maroc , mai mult... Legat de c\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83torie Patrimoniul Mondial al UNESCO , Linii aeriene ieftine din Europa , C\xc3\xa2nd ajungi \xc3\xaentr-un ora\xc5\x9f nou Ghiduri de conversa\xc5\xa3ie German\xc4\x83 , Englez\xc4\x83 , Italian\xc4\x83 , Francez\xc4\x83 , Spaniol\xc4\x83 , mai mult... Asia Shanghai , Bangkok , Tokio , Hong Kong , Auroville , mai mult... America de Sud S\xc3\xa3o Paulo , Buenos Aires , Brazilia , Cuba , mai mult... Oceania Sydney , Australia , Melbourne , Papua Noua Guinee , mai mult... Alte destina\xc5\xa3ii Caraibe , Baleare , Tur feroviar \xc3\xaen triunghiul transilv\xc4\x83nean , Lista \xc5\xa3\xc4\x83rilor de la A la Z , mai mult... Destina\xc5\xa3ia lunii 250px Mamaia Mamaia este cea mai mare sta\xc5\xa3iune rom\xc3\xa2neasc\xc4\x83 din coasta M\xc4\x83rii Negre. Este localizat\xc4\x83 la 5 km de ora\xc5\x9ful Constan\xc5\xa3a, \xc5\x9fi bariera dintre Lacul Siutghiol \xc5\x9fi Marea Neagr\xc4\x83. Sta\xc5\xa3iunea a fost deschis\xc4\x83 \xc3\xaen 1906. Acum poate g\xc4\x83zdui 20.000 de vizitatori \xc3\xaen peste 64 de hoteluri. Mamaia are o lungime de 8 km, iar 100 m2 g\xc4\x83zduie\xc5\x9fte plaje. Ea reprezint\xc4\x83 un mediu sportiv \xc5\x9fi cultural, g\xc4\x83zduind \xc3\xaen fiecare var\xc4\x83, Festivalul Muzical de Var\xc4\x83 \xe2\x80\x9eMamaia\xe2\x80\x9d. Foste destina\xc5\xa3ii ale lunii Proiectul Wikitravel Bun venit Nou veni\xc5\xa3i , Despre , Articole dorite , Hanul c\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83torilor , Plonja\xc5\xa3i \xc3\xaenainte , Wikic\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83tori , Groapa cu nisip \xc3\x8en alte limbi English (englez\xc4\x83) Fran\xc3\xa7ais (francez\xc4\x83) Versiuni de limb\xc4\x83 Proiect Punct de vedere neutru , Cioturi ce necesit\xc4\x83 aten\xc5\xa3ie , Ajutor , Manual de stil , Ajutor de editare , Conven\xc5\xa3ii pentru numirea articolelor , Despre proiect Wikitravel \xc3\xaen rom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 Rom\xc3\xa2nime \xc3\x8entreb\xc4\x83ri frecvente \xc5\x9etiri 7 octombrie 2004: S-a lansat noua interfa\xc5\xa3\xc4\x83 \xc5\x9fi software pentru Wikitravel, MediaWiki 1.3.5 cu MonoBook. S-au lansat \xc5\x9fi versiunile Wikitravel \xc3\xaen limba german\xc4\x83 \xc5\x9fi limba suedez\xc4\x83 . 9 august 2004: S-au lansat expedi\xc5\xa3iile pentru versiuni de Wikitravel \xc3\xaen suedez\xc4\x83 \xc5\x9fi italian\xc4\x83 . Proiectul pentru Wikitravel \xc3\xaen german\xc4\x83 deja are 5 utilizatori, deci \xc3\xaen cur\xc3\xa2nd se va lansa o versiune de Wikitravel \xc3\xaen aceast\xc4\x83 limb\xc4\x83. Se pare c\xc4\x83 \xc5\x9fi Wikitravel \xc3\xaen suedez\xc4\x83 este aproape de lansare. Noroc pentru aceste versiuni noi! 17 iulie 2004: Wikitravel \xc3\xaen limba rom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 a ajuns la 400 de articole! Al 400-lea articol a fost despre ora\xc5\x9ful \xc3\x96rebro \xc3\xaen Suedia. 1 mai 2004: A fost lansat noul design pentru pagina principal\xc4\x83 ( Portal ), marc\xc3\xa2nd o important\xc4\x83 faz\xc4\x83 a evolu\xc5\xa3iei Wikitravel! \xc3\x8en acela\xc5\x9fi timp, s-a \xc3\xaenceput sec\xc5\xa3iunea "Destina\xc5\xa3ia lunii", destina\xc5\xa3ie care va fi aleas\xc4\x83 pe baz\xc4\x83 de vot \xc3\xaen fiecare lun\xc4\x83. arhiva \xc5\x9ftirilor Dac\xc4\x83 vre\xc5\xa3i s\xc4\x83 contribui\xc5\xa3i, a\xc5\xa3i citit pagina de ajutor \xc5\x9fi \xc3\xaenc\xc4\x83 ave\xc5\xa3i neclarit\xc4\x83\xc5\xa3i legate de Wikitravel, pute\xc5\xa3i s\xc4\x83 ne l\xc4\x83sa\xc5\xa3i un mesaj f\xc4\x83c\xc3\xa2nd clic aici . Vom \xc3\xaencerca s\xc4\x83 v\xc4\x83 r\xc4\x83spundem pe aceast\xc4\x83 pagin\xc4\x83 f\xc4\x83r\xc4\x83 \xc3\xaent\xc3\xa2rziere. S'Wikitravel:Wikic\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83tori - Wikitravel Wikitravel:Wikic\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83tori De la Wikitravel Salt la: navigare , c\xc4\x83utare "[Echipaj] necesar \xc3\xaentr-o c\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83torie riscant\xc4\x83. Salariu mic. Frig mare. Luni lungi de \xc3\xaentuneric total. Pericol constant. \xc3\x8entoarcerea \xc3\xaen condi\xc5\xa3ii bune improbabil\xc4\x83. Onoare \xc5\x9fi recunoa\xc5\x9ftere \xc3\xaen caz de succes." -- Afi\xc5\x9f de recrutare pentru expedi\xc5\xa3ia din 1914 \xc3\xaen Antarctida cu HMS Endurance Wikic\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83torii sunt membrii ai unei comunit\xc4\x83\xc5\xa3i mondiale de contribuitori la Wikitravel . Wikitravel nu se afl\xc4\x83 online de mult, pentru a putea defini ce fel de oameni sunt Wikic\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83torii, dar este probabil rezonabil de spus c\xc4\x83 oamenii care sunt implica\xc5\xa3i \xc3\xaen Wikitravel sunt pasiona\xc5\xa3i de c\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83torii \xc3\xaen general \xc5\x9fi interesa\xc5\xa3i de partajarea cuno\xc5\x9ftiin\xc5\xa3elor \xc3\xaen particular. Wikic\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83torii nu sunt o organiza\xc5\xa3ie secret\xc4\x83 special\xc4\x83 sau un grup limitat. Suntem oameni ca dumneavoastr\xc4\x83, care dorim s\xc4\x83 \xc3\xaemp\xc4\x83rt\xc4\x83\xc5\x9fim cuno\xc5\x9ftin\xc5\xa3ele noastre cu dvs. Pute\xc5\xa3i deveni un Wikic\xc4\x83l\xc4\x83tor chiar acum ! Avem nevoie de ajutorul dvs. pentru a face din acest proiect un succes total. Mai avem mult de mers -- \xc5\x9fi tot ce pute\xc5\xa3i face ca s\xc4\x83 ne ajuta\xc5\xa3i ne aduce cu un pas mai aproape de succes. \xc3\x8enscrie\xc5\xa3i-v\xc4\x83 aici: Danutz Vlad Whiteman mihnea Adus de la \xe2\x80\x9e http://wikitravel.org/ro/Wikitravel:Wikic%C4%83l%C4%83tori \xe2\x80\x9d Unelte personale Creare cont / Autentificare Autentificare cu OpenID Spa\xc8\x9bii de nume Proiect Discu\xc8\x9bie Variante Vizualiz\xc4\x83ri Lectur\xc4\x83 Modificare Istoric Ac\xc8\x9biuni C\xc4\x83utare Navigare Portal Portalul comunit\xc4\x83\xc8\x9bii Schimb\xc4\x83ri recente Pagin\xc4\x83 aleatorie Ajutor Docents About Docent Trusa de unelte Ce trimite aici Modific\xc4\x83ri corelate Pagini speciale Versiune de tip\xc4\x83rit Leg\xc4\x83tur\xc4\x83 permanent\xc4\x83 \xc3\x8en alte limbi ca : Wikiviatgers de : Wikitraveller en : Wikitravellers es : Wikiviajeros fi : Wikimatkaajat fr : Wikivoyageurs it : Wikitravellers ja : \xe3\x82\xa6\xe3\x82\xa3\xe3\x82\xad\xe3\x83\x88\xe3\x83\xa9\xe3\x83\x99\xe3\x83\xa9\xe3\x83\xbc ko : Wikitravellers nl : Wikitravellers pt : Wikiviajantes ru : \xd0\x92\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbf\xd1\x83\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5\xd1\x88\xd0\xb5\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbd\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 sv : Wikiresen\xc3\xa4rer zh : \xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe8\x80\x85 Ultima modificare efectuat\xc4\x83 la 15:47, 15 noiembrie 2010. \xd0\x97\xd0\xb0\xd1\x85\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb4\xd0\xb8\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5 \xd0\xba \xd0\xbd\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbc! \xd0\x9f\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb6\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbb\xd1\x83\xd0\xb9\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xb0, \xd0\xbd\xd0\xb5 \xd0\xb7\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb1\xd1\x83\xd0\xb4\xd1\x8c\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5 \xd0\xb4\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb1\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb8\xd1\x82\xd1\x8c ~~~~ \xd0\xbf\xd0\xbe\xd1\x81\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb5 \xd0\xb2\xd0\xb0\xd1\x88\xd0\xb5\xd0\xb3\xd0\xbe \xd1\x81\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb1\xd1\x89\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f, \xd1\x87\xd1\x82\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb1\xd1\x8b \xd0\xbf\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb4\xd0\xbf\xd0\xb8\xd1\x81\xd0\xb0\xd1\x82\xd1\x8c\xd1\x81\xd1\x8f. \xd0\x9d\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbf\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb2\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb5 \xd0\xbc\xd0\xb5\xd1\x81\xd1\x8f\xd1\x86\xd0\xb0 \xd0\xaf\xd0\xba\xd1\x83\xd1\x82\xd1\x81\xd0\xba C\xd1\x82\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb8\xd1\x86\xd0\xb0 \xd0\xa0\xd0\xb5\xd1\x81\xd0\xbf\xd1\x83\xd0\xb1\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 \xd0\xa1\xd0\xb0\xd1\x85\xd0\xb0 ( \xd0\xaf\xd0\xba\xd1\x83\xd1\x82\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f ), \xd0\xbe\xd0\xb4\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbd \xd0\xb8\xd0\xb7 \xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd0\xb5\xd0\xb9\xd1\x88\xd0\xb8\xd1\x85 \xd0\xb3\xd0\xbe\xd1\x80\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb4\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb2 \xd0\xa1\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb1\xd0\xb8\xd1\x80\xd0\xb8. \xd0\x9d\xd0\xb0\xd1\x88\xd0\xb8 \xd0\xbf\xd1\x83\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5\xd0\xb2\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb4\xd0\xb8\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb8 \xd0\xa0\xd0\xbe\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f \xd0\x9c\xd0\xbe\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb0 , \xd0\xa1\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbd\xd0\xba\xd1\x82-\xd0\x9f\xd0\xb5\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5\xd1\x80\xd0\xb1\xd1\x83\xd1\x80\xd0\xb3 , \xd0\x92\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb4\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbc\xd0\xb8\xd1\x80 , \xd0\x9a\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb2\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb7\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb5 \xd0\x9c\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb5\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbb\xd1\x8c\xd0\xbd\xd1\x8b\xd0\xb5 \xd0\x92\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb4\xd1\x8b , \xd0\x9a\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x81\xd0\xbd\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb4\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 \xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb9 , \xd0\x9a\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\x90\xd0\xbb\xd1\x82\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb9 , \xd0\xa3\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbb , \xd0\x91\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb9\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbb \xd0\xb8 \xd0\xb4\xd1\x80\xd1\x83\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb5... \xd0\x95\xd0\xb2\xd1\x80\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbf\xd0\xb0 \xd0\x91\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbb\xd0\xbe\xd1\x80\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb0 , \xd0\x9c\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb4\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\x93\xd1\x80\xd1\x83\xd0\xb7\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\x90\xd1\x80\xd0\xbc\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\x90\xd0\xb7\xd0\xb5\xd1\x80\xd0\xb1\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb9\xd0\xb4\xd0\xb6\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbd , \xd0\xad\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\x9b\xd0\xb0\xd1\x82\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\x9b\xd0\xb8\xd1\x82\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb0 , \xd0\x91\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\x9f\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbb\xd1\x8c\xd1\x88\xd0\xb0 , \xd0\xa7\xd0\xb5\xd1\x85\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\xa1\xd0\xbb\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb0\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd0\xbc\xd1\x8b\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\x9a\xd1\x83\xd0\xb1\xd0\xb0 , \xd0\x9a\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb4\xd0\xb0 , \xd0\x9c\xd0\xb5\xd0\xba\xd1\x81\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 , \xd0\x92\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb4\xd0\xbd\xd1\x8b\xd0\xb9 \xd0\xbf\xd1\x83\xd1\x82\xd1\x8c \xd0\xb8\xd0\xb7 \xd0\x9c\xd0\xbe\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb2\xd1\x8b \xd0\xb2 \xd0\x9a\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb8\xd1\x84\xd0\xbe\xd1\x80\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\x9b\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb1\xd1\x8b\xd1\x82\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb8 , \xd0\xa5\xd0\xbe\xd1\x88\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbc\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbd , \xd0\x94\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbf\xd1\x80\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbf\xd0\xb5\xd1\x82\xd1\x80\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb2\xd1\x81\xd0\xba , \xd0\x94\xd1\x83\xd0\xb1\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb8 , \xd0\xa1\xd0\xb5\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb0\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbf\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbb\xd1\x8c , \xd0\x9b\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbd , \xd0\x9c\xd0\xb0\xd1\x85\xd0\xb0\xd1\x87\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb0 , \xd0\xa2\xd0\xb1\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb8\xd1\x81\xd0\xb8 , \xd0\xa1\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbd-\xd0\xa5\xd1\x83\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbd , \xd0\xa4\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb4\xd0\xbe\xd1\x81\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\x9b\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbb\xd0\xbb\xd1\x8c , \xd0\x90\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbf\xd0\xb0 , \xd0\x91\xd0\xbe\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbd , \xd0\xa8\xd1\x82\xd1\x83\xd1\x82\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x82 , \xd0\x9a\xd0\xbe\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 , \xd0\x9d\xd0\xb8\xd1\x86\xd1\x86\xd0\xb0 , \xd0\x9c\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbd\xd1\x87\xd0\xb5\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xb5\xd1\x80 , \xd0\xa2\xd1\x83\xd1\x80\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbd , \xd0\x98\xd0\xb3\xd1\x83\xd0\xbc\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbd\xd0\xb8\xd1\x86\xd0\xb0 , \xd0\x9c\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb0\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd1\x80\xd0\xb8\xd1\x85\xd1\x82 , \xd0\xa1\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbd-\xd0\xa4\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbd\xd1\x86\xd0\xb8\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xbe , \xd0\x92\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb0\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbc , \xd0\x95\xd0\xb2\xd0\xbf\xd0\xb0\xd1\x82\xd0\xbe\xd1\x80\xd0\xb8\xd1\x8f , \xd0\x93\xd1\x80\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb4\xd0\xbd\xd0\xbe , \xd0\x90\xd0\xbd\xd1\x82\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbb\xd1\x8c\xd1\x8f , \xd0\x9d\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbb\xd1\x8c\xd1\x87\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba \xd0\xb8 \xd0\xbc\xd0\xbd\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb5 \xd0\xb4\xd1\x80\xd1\x83\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb5 \xd0\x9d\xd0\xb0 \xd0\xb4\xd1\x80\xd1\x83\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb8\xd1\x85 \xd1\x8f\xd0\xb7\xd1\x8b\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0\xd1\x85 \xd0\x91\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbb\xd1\x8c\xd1\x88\xd0\xb5 1\xc2\xa0000 \xd0\xa1\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb4\xd0\xb5\xd1\x80\xd0\xb6\xd0\xb8\xd0\xbc\xd0\xbe\xd0\xb5 \xd0\xb4\xd0\xbe\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd1\x83\xd0\xbf\xd0\xbd\xd0\xbe \xd0\xb2 \xd1\x81\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbe\xd1\x82\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb5\xd1\x82\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xb2\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb8 \xd1\x81 Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0. \xd0\x9f\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb8\xd1\x82\xd0\xb8\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 \xd0\xba\xd0\xbe\xd0\xbd\xd1\x84\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb4\xd0\xb5\xd0\xbd\xd1\x86\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb0\xd0\xbb\xd1\x8c\xd0\xbd\xd0\xbe\xd1\x81\xd1\x82\xd0\xb8 S'Copyleft - Wikitravel Shared "Wikitravel has a speed and convenience the books\' publishers can only envy." \xe2\x80\x94 Time Europe Copyleft From Wikitravel Shared Jump to: navigation , search Contents Licensing Things for users to know Things for contributors to know [+] Frequently asked questions What do I need to do to get writing? What do I need to do to get uploading images? How will I be attributed? Can GFDL content be used on Wikitravel? Can I copy text and other content to Wikitravel from other sites? If content is available free-of-charge, can it be used here? How should I ask for permission to use a forum reply on Wikitravel? See also The Universal License of Our Wiki Wikitravel uses a copyleft license for all text, images, and other content on the Web site. Anyone can use Wikitravel content according to the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike license. And anyone can contribute their own or other people\'s text and images, as long as the work is their own or available under a compatible license. It is very important that you understand how copyleft works before you contribute to Wikitravel . If you find your work reused by someone else in a manner that you didn\'t consider, or if you stop using Wikitravel for any reason, it is not possible to change the license for the text and photographs you have already submitted. Although you always own the copyright in your work, that does not give you the right to change how it can be used retrospectively. [ edit ] Licensing If this seems confusing, skip down to the FAQ . All written contributions to Wikitravel are and must be licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 ( CC-by-SA 3.0 ) or a compatible license (e.g., Public Domain, CC-by-SA any, dual CC-by-SA/GDFL any, etc.). Consequently, all redistributed and derivative works of Wikitravel text must also be licensed as CC-by-SA 3.0. Files uploaded to Wikitravel are and must be licensed under any of the available options in the pulldown menu on the upload form . Consequently, all redistributed and derivative works including Wikitravel images and other files must provide file-specific attribution and licensing information, available on the individual file page. Two small subsets of images on Wikitravel may be copyrighted, and not available for redistribution or derivative works, although these copyrighted images will never appear in a Wikitravel article. For more information on these narrow categories of copyrighted images, see Template:Copyrighted . [ edit ] Things for users to know Copyleft means that every single author, editor, illustrator, mapmaker, factchecker and photographer who puts their work into Wikitravel gives you the right to read, copy, print, save, download, read aloud, project, modify, email, distribute, sell, photocopy and correct their work however you want to. The only restrictions are that: if you distribute it, or derive new work from it you must give attribution to the creators you must retain the work and any derivative works under the same licensing . Attribution In other words, we give you practically every freedom within the boundaries of the law to use the information in Wikitravel, except the freedom to take that freedom away from others. The license we use is the Attribution-ShareAlike license. It\'s a piece of legal documentation created by the great people at Creative Commons that basically says the same thing as above: give Wikitravellers credit for their work, and share with other people. If you want you can read the full text of the Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 license . For the purposes of the License, a Work is the formatted text that makes up a single Wikitravel Shared article. Each file individually is also a Work for the purposes of the License. In addition, there may be other restrictions on use or distribution based on law in your country or state; in particular, consider privacy rights for photographs of people and derivative works for photographs of buildings and artworks. Lastly, to the extent possible there is no warranty on any of the articles or images in Wikitravel. Hotels close; bars raise prices; train schedules change; earthquakes, mudslides, wars and lightning strikes destroy sights, statues and cities. People make mistakes. Wikitravellers try their best, but none of the creators of these pages are responsible to you in any way for any injury or discomfort you endure before, after, or during your travels. See the License above for details. If you\'re setting up a mirror web site, you might want to check out How to re-use Wikitravel guides . [ edit ] Things for contributors to know Share-Alike Copyleft means that every single yahoo, nutcase, screwjob, charlatan, shyster, weirdo, freakazoid, mouthbreather, goofball, lamer, cheater and jerk will have the right to read, copy, print, save, download, read aloud, project, modify, email, distribute, sell, photocopy and correct your work however they want to. In particular , your work can be ruthlessly modified, edited, or cut from Wikitravel altogether by other Wikitravellers . It can be photocopied thousands of times and passed around as flyers by itinerant backpackers. It can be put in Hollywood movies, and it can be projected onto a screen at an outdoor rave. It can be used for commercial ventures, advertisements, or other purposes (with some restrictions - see privacy rights ) without your direct control. In return for your incredible generosity , you will have the knowledge that you are helping travellers all over the world, and that all copies made of your work will be attributed to you, and that everyone who derives new works from yours will have to be just as generous as you are. And, of course, you get to use all the other work in Wikitravel Shared the same way; but you don\'t need to contribute to do that. You\'ll also get the pleasure of collaborating with hundreds of other Wikitravellers just like yourself. You\'ll get free spellcheck service from nit-picky folks you\'ve never met. You\'ll work together with people you don\'t know to make better pictures, text, and maps than you\'ve ever dreamed of. You still retain the copyright over your own work, and you can use it any other way you want (even if it\'s not compatible with our license!). By writing on Wikitravel, or uploading photos, you\'re using a license under which all our work is available - making it simpler for everyone. Now, the hard part: because of the Attribution-ShareAlike license, you are legally responsible not to put other people\'s copyrighted work into Wikitravel without permission. You are responsible for getting model releases from people you take pictures of, and you are responsible for any libel you include in your articles. Before editing Wikitravel articles or uploading pictures, you should read very carefully the full text of the Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 license , and make sure that you agree to it. For images, it\'s important to mark the image as either your own work, or give information on who made the picture and why you think it\'s acceptable under the broad terms of Attribution-Sharealike that govern Wikitravel\'s licensing. See Wikitravel Shared:Image policy for more information. We want to make the best possible travel guide, with the most brilliant writing, the most up-to-date info, the most awe-inspiring photos, the most detailed and readable maps. But no one item is worth putting yourself and this project in legal jeopardy. If you have any questions about the source of something you want to put in Wikitravel, ask about it first . When in doubt, leave it out. [ edit ] Frequently asked questions By = Attribution [ edit ] What do I need to do to get writing? Nothing , just plunge forward! Whenever you save something you write, you automatically license it for use under CC-by-SA 3.0. So all you need to do is get started writing\xe2\x80\x94if the text is your own original writing, don\'t worry about licenses. [ edit ] What do I need to do to get uploading images? First, be sure that the image is either one created by you or one that is freely licensed (see "Can I copy text and other content to Wikitravel from other sites?" below). Second, you should register an account on Wikitravel Shared, the central repository for Wikitravel files. Then, go to the upload screen , where you select the file to upload and enter an upload summary. The summary must include a choice of license from the pulldown menu, as well as attribution information indicating how you wish to be credited. If the image is not your own, be sure to provide accurate licensing and attribution information, as well as a link to the source from which you got the image. The simplest way to make sure everything is correctly documented is to use the image credit template (see How to upload files for detailed instructions). If the template seems too intimidating, an acceptable comment might be: Image copyright 2006 by [[User:YourNameHere]], dual-licensed under the CC-SA 1.0 (or later) and the GFDL. Taken by [[User:YourNameHere]]. There are some additional restrictions in specific cases (such as when photographing people) so please also read our Image policy . [ edit ] How will I be attributed? You will only be attributed for text contributions if you register a user account. Whatever you enter as your "real name" will appear in the revision history of any pages you modify, serving as attribution. If you register, but decline to enter a "real name," you will be attributed by your user name. For files you upload, you must provide the attribution information yourself in the upload summary. So, just indicate however you want to be attributed as you upload the file! [ edit ] Can GFDL content be used on Wikitravel? See also: Why Wikitravel isn\'t GFDL This is complicated. In a nutshell: Text licensed under any version of the GFDL is not compatible with Wikitravel. Images that are licensed under GFDL 1.3 or later , including eg. "GFDL 1.1 or later", are compatible with Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 and can be uploaded to Wikitravel Shared. Images licensed (only) under GFDL 1.2 or earlier are not compatible with Wikitravel and cannot be used. [ edit ] Can I copy text and other content to Wikitravel from other sites? Usually No . That is, unless you are the original author of the text, or the other website has been explicitly licensed as compatible with Creative Commons Attribution/Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0, or it is in the public domain. If you are the original author of the text, note that on the article talk page, or else someone will likely remove it as a copyright violation. Wikimedia projects like Wikipedia have a compatible license, so we can copy relevant text (although copying significant amount of text is discouraged). When copying content from another site with a compatible license be sure to provide proper attribution, as required by the CC-by-SA license. This means citing the license, author and source of images on any image page, and noting the license, author and source of text content on the article talk page . For the content to be public domain, it needs to be created by the US Federal Government, the city government of Washington, D.C., or have a statement on the website saying it is released into the public domain. Lack of a copyright notice does not mean the content is free to re-use\xe2\x80\x94all online content is automatically copyrighted unless the author explicitly states otherwise. [ edit ] If content is available free-of-charge, can it be used here? Probably not. Just because a map, brochure, or other item is given away for free does not mean that it has been freely licensed . For content to be usable on Wikitravel the content copyright owner must agree to license it under the CC-SA 3.0 or a compatible license. [ edit ] How should I ask for permission to use a forum reply on Wikitravel? The following template can help. Please quote your original message and reply to it at the respective article\'s Talk page. You may provide attribution to the original author(s) listing them by a template like en:Template:Attribution . Hi (person name). Do you mind if I use some pieces of your post (<forum post URL>) to contribute to an article on <destination> at Wikitravel, a free online travel guide written and edited entirely by travelers from around the globe? The current edition of the article I am going to update is here: <article URL>. Wikitravel requires that all the content is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 license. Basically this means that your content: - can be distributed by others, as long as you are credited as the author - may be further edited by other contributors So do you mind if I use your text at Wikitravel? <your signature> You may also use the following text, which you need the copyright holder to clearly acknowledge: I hereby assert that I am the creator and/or sole owner of the exclusive copyright of WORK [the filename]. The text of this web page is available for modification and reuse under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribute Share-Alike, version 3,0 and earlier. I acknowledge that I grant anyone the right to use the work in a commercial product, and to modify it according to their needs, as long as they abide by the terms of the license and any other applicable laws. I am aware that I always retain copyright of my work, and retain the right to be attributed in accordance with the license chosen. Modifications others make to the work will not be attributed to me. I am aware that the free license only concerns copyright, and I reserve the option to take action against anyone who uses this work in a libelous way, or in violation of personality rights, trademark restrictions, etc. I acknowledge that I cannot withdraw this agreement, and that the work may or may not be kept permanently on a Wikitravel project.
