S'How to re-use Wikitravel guides - Wikitravel Shared "Wikitravel has a speed and convenience the books\' publishers can only envy." \xe2\x80\x94 Time Europe How to re-use Wikitravel guides From Wikitravel Shared Jump to: navigation , search Wikitravel articles and images are available under a copyleft license. This means you can redistribute and modify them in any medium, as long as you follow a few simple rules. [ edit ] The short answer To redistribute Wikitravel content, you must: Attribute the authors of the content (Not just Wikitravel). Clearly note that the Wikitravel text content as being available under the CC-by-SA 3.0 license, and note the specific copyright for each image. There are no other requirements. [ edit ] About our license Our license, the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 , requires three main things from people redistributing an article: You give attribution to the authors of the article. You make any derivative works available under the same license. You notify readers and other users of the license. The following is our interpretation of the license requirements. It is not legal advice . [ edit ] Attribution You can give attribution to the authors according to their real names (preferred) or Wikitravel user names. For users identified with an IP address instead of a user name, you can use "Anonymous" or "Anonymous user of Wikitravel". You don\'t have to list any name more than once. [ edit ] Text Every page on Wikitravel has a credits block at the end of the page; for pages where all the authors names will fit in it, this should be sufficient for attribution. However, when there are too many authors names to fit in that block, you must follow the others link at the end of the block to get the complete set of credits for attribution. Each Wikitravel article also has an HTML link element of type meta that points to an RDF file with the author names. This may be easier to parse automatically. Sample wording : This page is based on work by John Smith, Jane Jones and other users . Alternatively, you may choose to simply point back to the credits of the original Wikitravel article: Sample wording : A list of contributors is available at the original article on Wikitravel. [ edit ] Images For images, the author history can (only) be found on the corresponding Image: page. Images often have image specific licensing and attribution which differs from the article itself, so you should double check the image file page before redistributing or creating derivative works, to make certain you provide accurate licensing & attribution information. [ edit ] ShareAlike Any redistributed Wikitravel articles or derivative works based on Wikitravel articles must also be licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0. Redistributed images or derivative works based on Wikitravel images must remain under the same license as appears on the individual image page (it is necessary to "click through" the thumbnail to get to individual image pages). [ edit ] Notice You must provide a link to the Attribution-ShareAlike license to notify readers and users of their rights to the article text or image. The URL of the license should be sufficient. Sample wording : Content on this page is available under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 license . [ edit ] Practice These are some practical notes for re-using Wikitravel guides. wikitravel.org is a service for creating and editing these free guides. We can\'t support the bandwidth and processing requirements of uses not tuned to this purpose. We prefer not to serve files or articles if they\'re framed or embedded into other pages. If you create a Web mirror, it can help if you put a link on en:Wikitravel:Mirrors . [ edit ] Link back Wikitravel articles are written, edited, and illustrated by readers. Our quality improves when readers can fix factual errors, misspellings, or other make other improvements. For this reason, we ask that you also link back to the original Wikitravel article, allowing your readers to update it. This is just a request; it\'s not part of the license requirements. A link back is not a substitute for following the terms of the license. [ edit ] API A MediaWiki API for programmatic access to the site is available at http://wikitravel.org/wiki/ code /api.php, where code is one of the language versions of Wikitravel, eg. "en" for English. When using the API, please follow the terms of use and download no more than one article every 30 seconds, or you may be blocked without warning. [ edit ] XML data feeds Ideally, it would be possible to obtain XML data dumps of Wikitravel content, to facilitate the reuse of Wikitravel content, in line with the intent of the Attribution-ShareAlike license and the goals of this site. Internet Brands , the company that owns Wikitravel\'s servers, has expressed the wish to restrict access to XML data dumps and to consider requests for them on an individual basis. To date no one has actually obtained an XML data dump from Internet Brands. Please see en:Wikitravel:Database dump for more details. See also: en:Wikitravel:Mirrors , Non-compliant redistribution Retrieved from " http://wikitravel.org/shared/How_to_re-use_Wikitravel_guides " Personal tools Log in / create account Log in with OpenID Namespaces Page Discussion Variants Views Read Edit View history Actions Search Navigation Main Page Travellers\' pub Recent changes Random image Gallery of new files Help Tech requests Contact Internet Brands Wikitravel Extra RSS Travel news and trivia Toolbox What links here Related changes Special pages Printable version Permanent link In other languages de : Wie Wikitravel-Inhalte weiterverwendet werden k\xc3\xb6nnen en : How to re-use Wikitravel guides fr : Comment r\xc3\xa9utiliser le contenu des guides Wikitravel ja : \xe3\x82\xa6\xe3\x82\xa3\xe3\x82\xad\xe3\x83\x88\xe3\x83\xa9\xe3\x83\x99\xe3\x83\xab\xe3\x81\xae\xe5\x86\x8d\xe5\x88\xa9\xe7\x94\xa8\xe3\x81\xae\xe3\x81\x97\xe3\x81\x8b\xe3\x81\x9f nl : Hoe Wikitravel gidsen te hergebruiken pt : Como reutilizar conte\xc3\xbado do Wikitravel sv : Redistribution This page was last modified on 2 March 2011, at 02:19. S'Internet Brands - Wikitravel Shared "Wikitravel has a speed and convenience the books\' publishers can only envy." \xe2\x80\x94 Time Europe Internet Brands From Wikitravel Shared Jump to: navigation , search Contents [+] Contact list Community leaders Technical problems Legal issues See also Internet Brands [1] is the company which owns and develops the Wikitravel trademark and websites. Contact list Internet Brands, Inc. 909 North Sepulveda Blvd., 11th Floor El Segundo, CA 90245 USA Community leaders Paul - User:IBobi . Community Manager. E-mail: paul.obrien at internetbrands.com Aleksandra - User:IBAlex . Community Specialist. E-mail: aleksandra.wocial at internetbrands.com Technical problems For non-urgent tech requests and bug reports, please contact Paul or Aleksandra above. For emergencies that must be resolved immediately, please contact: urgent at wikitravel.org - for the highest priority issues. (i.e. Site down) Legal issues Internet Brands has a legal team with varying specialties. Paul O\'Brien - User:IBobi can be used as a first point of contact. (Please note that on-site discussion of legal matters at times may not be appropriate. In such situations, email and phone conversations may be needed.) S'Language versions - Wikitravel Shared "Wikitravel has a speed and convenience the books\' publishers can only envy." \xe2\x80\x94 Time Europe Language versions From Wikitravel Shared Jump to: navigation , search Wikitravel is available in multiple non-English languages. This allows us to provide information to travellers who don\'t speak English, and to get knowledge from travellers who don\'t write English. Starting and maintaining language versions of Wikitravel is governed by our language version policy . The following language versions are currently active: Wikitravel language versions language code started expedition Arabic ar 8 Jul 2008 Arabic Wikitravel Catalan ca 22 Feb 2007 Catalan Wikitravel Chinese zh 9 Jan 2008 Chinese Wikitravel Dutch nl 16 Dec 2005 Dutch Wikitravel English en 24 Jul 2003 N/A Esperanto eo 2006 Esperanto Wikitravel Finnish fi 22 Feb 2007 Finnish French fr 12 Feb 2004 French Wikitravel German de 7 Oct 2004 German Wikitravel Hebrew he 29 May 2007 Hebrew Wikitravel Hindi hi 20 Mar 2007 Hindi Wikitravel Hungarian hu 6 Oct 2006 Hungarian Wikitravel Italian it 11 Jun 2006 Italian Wikitravel Japanese ja 18 Jun 2005 Japanese Wikitravel Korean ko 21 Oct 2009 Korean Wikitravel Polish pl 31 Mar 2006 Polish Wikitravel Portuguese pt 27 Jan 2006 Portuguese Wikitravel Romanian ro 27 Dec 2003 Romanian Wikitravel Russian ru 28 Jul 2007 Russian Wikitravel Spanish es 31 Jan 2006 Spanish Wikitravel Swedish sv 7 Oct 2004 Swedish Wikitravel The codes above are needed for interlanguage links between Wikitravel versions. A liaison is a user who\'s volunteered to keep a connection open between the language version and the rest of Wikitravel. See the language version policy for details on this job. [ edit ] See also Language Expeditions \xe2\x80\x94 for starting new language versions Inter-language links \xe2\x80\x94 how to link between language versions Multilingual statistics \xe2\x80\x94 for data on Wikitravel growth Liaison reports \xe2\x80\x94 news from language versions Retrieved from " http://wikitravel.org/shared/Language_versions " Category : Wikitravel Shared meta pages Personal tools Log in / create account Log in with OpenID Namespaces Page Discussion Variants Views Read Edit View history Actions Search Navigation Main Page Travellers\' pub Recent changes Random image Gallery of new files Help Tech requests Contact Internet Brands Wikitravel Extra RSS Travel news and trivia Toolbox What links here Related changes Special pages Printable version Permanent link In other languages ca : Versions ling\xc3\xbcistiques de Wikitravel de : Anderssprachige Versionen von Wikitravel en : Language versions of Wikitravel fr : Diff\xc3\xa9rentes langues de Wikitravel hu : Wikitravel m\xc3\xa1s nyelveken it : Versioni linguistiche di Wikitravel ja : \xe4\xbb\x96\xe8\xa8\x80\xe8\xaa\x9e\xe7\x89\x88\xe3\x82\xa6\xe3\x82\xa3\xe3\x82\xad\xe3\x83\x88\xe3\x83\xa9\xe3\x83\x99\xe3\x83\xab pt : Vers\xc3\xb5es de l\xc3\xadnguas do Wikitravel ro : Versiuni de limb\xc4\x83 ale Wikitravel This page was last modified on 11 January 2013, at 18:36. S'Main Page - Wikitravel Shared "Wikitravel has a speed and convenience the books\' publishers can only envy." \xe2\x80\x94 Time Europe Main Page From Wikitravel Shared Jump to: navigation , search +/- English (en) \xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\xa2\xc2\xa0 Suomi (fi) \xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\xa2\xc2\xa0 Nederlands (nl) \xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\xa2\xc2\xa0 \xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (bg) \xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\xa2\xc2\xa0 \xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (ru) \xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\xa2\xc2\xa0 \xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (ja) \xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\xa2\xc2\xa0 \xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (ko) \xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\xa2\xc2\xa0 \xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (zh-hans) \xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\xa2\xc2\xa0 \xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (zh-hant) Are you new to Wikitravel Shared? Please click here to begin! Wikitravel Shared is the central coordination point and shared repository for images and other media for all language versions of Wikitravel , the free, complete, up-to-date and reliable world-wide travel guide. Wikitravel Shared currently contains 35,119 files uploaded by Wikitravellers. Wikitravel strives to be a leader in travel research with up-to-date and complete articles, and images can often convey more than a thousand words. Some articles may already have images, however, should you happen to have an image that captures the soul of the destination please replace the current image with your own. Additionally, some articles don\'t have any images at all and we welcome any contribution you can make. Please visit the list of the articles without an image at Requests for images . Images by geography Africa Asia Australasia & Oceania Europe Middle East North America Central America & Caribbean South America See also : Cuisine , Maps , Events and festivals , Other Tech requests Bug reports : file new bug \xe2\x80\xa2 top bugs \xe2\x80\xa2 open bugs \xe2\x80\xa2 fixed bugs Feature requests : file new feature request \xe2\x80\xa2 roadmap \xe2\x80\xa2 open features \xe2\x80\xa2 finished features Useful functions Image search Create an account (required for uploading) Upload an image List of new images How to use Shared images To use a Shared image on any Wikitravel language version, just use the normal syntax [[Image: filename.jpg ]] to include it. Either the English Image: or the local language ( Bild: , \xe7\x94\xbb\xe5\x83\x8f: , etc) can be used as the command. The Wikitravel software will automatically check both the Shared and the local image repositories for the image. Note that if the same filename exists on both the local site and the Shared site, the local image has precedence. Project coordination Language Expeditions -- Starting new language versions of Wikitravel. Liaison reports -- Reports for progress on individual Wikitravel versions. S'Report a problem - Wikitravel Shared "Wikitravel has a speed and convenience the books\' publishers can only envy." \xe2\x80\x94 Time Europe Report a problem From Wikitravel Shared Jump to: navigation , search Travellers\' Pub on Wikitravel Shared is a place where Wikitravellers of all languages can report problems and send feature requests . Please add new questions at the bottom of the page by clicking here and sign your post by appending four tildes (~~~~) to it, but otherwise plunge forward ! Now, if you want to go back to Wikitravel please click here . S'Huvudsida - Wikitravel Hj\xc3\xa4lp Wikitravel att blir en b\xc3\xa4ttre reseguide! L\xc3\xa4s h\xc3\xa4r Huvudsida Fr\xc3\xa5n Wikitravel, den fria resehandboken. Hoppa till: navigering , s\xc3\xb6k V\xc3\xa4lkommen till Wikitravel p\xc3\xa5 svenska! M\xc3\xa5let med Wikitravel \xc3\xa4r att skapa en trov\xc3\xa4rdig, gratis och uppdaterad resehandbok. Alla, \xc3\xa4ven DU , kan skriva om n\xc3\xa5got du kan eller hitta en artikel om n\xc3\xa5gon plats du k\xc3\xa4nner till. Du kan se vad andra skrivit under senaste \xc3\xa4ndringarna och de nyaste artiklarna. Vill du prova p\xc3\xa5 tekniken kan du g\xc3\xb6ra det i sandl\xc3\xa5dan . Du kan skapa ett anv\xc3\xa4ndarnamn under Logga in . Vill du ha hj\xc3\xa4lp med n\xc3\xa5got kan du bes\xc3\xb6ka Resen\xc3\xa4rspuben eller klicka p\xc3\xa5 Hj\xc3\xa4lp . Antal artiklar: 1\xc2\xa0430 De senaste artiklarna Wikitravelguiden Alla sidor | Artikelstatus | \xc3\x96nskelistan Europa Norden , \xc3\x96steuropa , V\xc3\xa4steuropa , Brittiska \xc3\xb6arna , Ryssland och Kaukasien , mer... Nordamerika USA , Kanada , V\xc3\xa4stindien , mer... Sydamerika Brasilien , Argentina , Chile , Peru , Venezuela , mer... Centralamerika Mexiko , Guatemala , Kuba , Jamaica , mer... Asien Centralasien , \xc3\x96stasien , Mellan\xc3\xb6stern , S\xc3\xb6dra Asien , Sydostasien , Ryssland och Kaukasien mer... Afrika Nordafrika , Sahara , V\xc3\xa4stafrika , Centralafrika , \xc3\x96stafrika , S\xc3\xb6dra Afrika , mer... Oceanien Australien , Nya Zeeland , Papua Nya Guinea , mer... Andra resm\xc3\xa5l Festivaler och evenemang , Antarktis , Arktis , Rymden , mer... Parl\xc3\xb6rer Engelska , franska , japanska , fler... Reserelaterade \xc3\xa4mnen L\xc3\xa4nder A-\xc3\x96 , Reseplanering , Allemansr\xc3\xa4tten , Kl\xc3\xa4dkod , mer... M\xc3\xa5nadens resm\xc3\xa5l Singapore Singapore \xc3\xa4r en lilla stat i Asien. Singapore har en temperatur \xc3\xb6ver 20\xc2\xb0C all runt \xc3\xa5r, s\xc3\xa5 det blir en bra resmal p\xc3\xa5 kalt vinter. ( Mer... ) Tidigare utvalda artiklar : Paris , Madrid , Berlin , Helsingfors , London , Motala , Ving\xc3\xa5ker , Nybro , Mariestad , Uppsala , Uddevalla , Helsingfors , Tokyo , Riga , \xc3\x96land , Polen , Kalmar , Hvar . Wikitravelprojektet V\xc3\xa4lkommen Nyb\xc3\xb6rjare , Wikipedister , Var dj\xc3\xa4rv! , Information om cookies , Wikitravelinst\xc3\xa4llningar , Anv\xc3\xa4ndarguide , Anv\xc3\xa4ndbart Om Wikitravel Om oss , Vad Wikitravel \xc3\xa4r och inte \xc3\xa4r , Regler och riktlinjer , Riktlinjer f\xc3\xb6r anv\xc3\xa4ndande av bilder , Neutralt skrivande , Regler mot sexturism Drift Byr\xc3\xa5krater , administrat\xc3\xb6rer , artikelstatus Hj\xc3\xa4lp Hj\xc3\xa4lp , FAQ , S\xc3\xb6khj\xc3\xa4lp , Resen\xc3\xa4rspuben , IRC , mer... Verktyg Etikett , Geografibeskrivning , Mallar , Regler f\xc3\xb6r hur en artikel ska se ut , Reseavisering , Sandl\xc3\xa5dan Creative Commons Creative Commons-licensen , Varf\xc3\xb6r anv\xc3\xa4nds inte GFDL p\xc3\xa5 Wikitravel? , Copyleft . Projekt Kartritare , parl\xc3\xb6rer , RDF , fler... M\xc3\xa5nadens samarbete M\xc3\xa5nadens samarbete Sk\xc3\xa5ne - Mars 2013 K\xc3\xa4nner du till en Wikitravelartikel om ett betydande resm\xc3\xa5l med alltf\xc3\xb6r lite inneh\xc3\xa5ll? D\xc3\xa5 kanske artikeln borde v\xc3\xa4ljas till m\xc3\xa5nadens samarbete! Loggbok 8 juni 2012 : V\xc3\xa5r programvara \xc3\xa4r uppgraderad till MediaWiki 1.17! S'\xe8\x87\xaa\xe7\x94\xb1\xe7\x9a\x84\xe4\xb8\x96\xe7\x95\x8c\xe6\x97\x85\xe6\xb8\xb8\xe5\xae\x9d\xe5\x85\xb8 - Wikitravel \xe9\x87\x8d\xe8\xa6\x81\xe5\x91\x8a\xe7\xa4\xba \xc2\xa0: \xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe7\x9a\x84\xe6\x8e\x88\xe6\xac\x8a\xe6\xa2\x9d\xe6\xac\xbe\xe5\xbe\x9eCC by 2.0\xe5\x8d\x87\xe7\xb4\x9a\xe5\x88\xb0CC by-sa 3.0\xef\xbc\x8c \xe8\xa9\xb3\xe7\xb4\xb0\xe6\x83\x85\xe5\xbd\xa2\xe8\xab\x8b\xe5\x8f\x83\xe8\xa6\x8b \xe9\x80\x99\xe8\xa3\x8f \xe3\x80\x82 \xe7\x9b\xae\xe5\x89\x8d\xe6\x9c\xac\xe7\xab\x99\xe7\x9a\x84\xe7\xae\xa1\xe7\x90\x86\xe5\x93\xa1\xe7\x82\xba: User:msnhinet8 \xe9\x80\x99\xe8\xa3\x8f \xe3\x80\x82 \xe9\xa6\x96\xe9\xa0\x81 \xe5\xaf\xbc\xe8\x88\xaa , \xe6\x90\x9c\xe7\xb4\xa2 \xe5\xbb\xba\xe8\xad\xb0: \xe5\x9c\xa8\xe6\xad\xa3\xe5\xbc\x8f\xe5\x95\x9f\xe5\x8b\x95\xe4\xbb\xa5\xe5\x89\x8d,\xe9\x82\x84\xe6\x9c\x89\xe5\xbe\x88\xe5\xa4\x9a\xe5\xb7\xa5\xe4\xbd\x9c\xe9\x9c\x80\xe8\xa6\x81\xe5\xae\x8c\xe6\x88\x90\xe3\x80\x82 \xe7\xbf\xbb\xe8\xad\xaf\xe8\xab\x8b\xe4\xb8\x89\xe6\x80\x9d\xe8\x80\x8c\xe5\xbe\x8c\xe8\xa1\x8c\xef\xbc\x8c\xe8\xb3\xaa\xe9\x87\x8f\xe7\xac\xac\xe4\xb8\x80\xef\xbc\x8c\xe5\x9b\xa0\xe7\x82\xba\xe5\xb0\x87\xe4\xbe\x86\xe6\x9b\xb4\xe6\x94\xb9\xe6\x9c\x83\xe6\xaf\x94\xe8\xbc\x83\xe5\x9b\xb0\xe9\x9b\xa3\xe3\x80\x82 \xe5\xbe\x88\xe5\xa4\x9a\xe5\xb0\x88\xe6\x9c\x89\xe5\x90\x8d\xe8\xa9\x9e\xe5\xb7\xb2\xe7\xb6\x93\xe5\x9c\xa8 \xe8\x8b\xb1\xe6\x96\x87\xe7\x89\x88\xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c \xe6\x88\x96\xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\x9f\xba\xe7\x99\xbe\xe7\xa7\x91\xe6\x9c\x89\xe6\x89\x80\xe5\xae\x9a\xe7\xbe\xa9\xe3\x80\x82\xe5\xbb\xba\xe8\xad\xb0\xe6\x8e\xa1\xe7\x94\xa8\xe5\xb7\xb2\xe6\x9c\x89\xe7\x9a\x84\xe6\xa6\x82\xe5\xbf\xb5\xe3\x80\x82 \xe4\xb8\x8d\xe5\x90\x8c\xe6\x84\x8f\xe8\xa6\x8b\xe6\x95\xac\xe8\xab\x8b\xe5\x9c\xa8\xe8\xa8\x8e\xe8\xab\x96\xe5\x8d\x80\xe5\x85\xa7\xe7\x99\xbc\xe8\xa1\xa8\xe3\x80\x82 \xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c \xef\xbc\x88 Wikitravel \xef\xbc\x89\xe6\x98\xaf\xe4\xb8\x80\xe5\x80\x8b\xe8\x87\xb4\xe5\x8a\x9b\xe6\x96\xbc\xe5\x89\xb5\xe9\x80\xa0 \xe8\x87\xaa\xe7\x94\xb1 \xe3\x80\x81\xe5\xae\x8c\xe6\x95\xb4\xe3\x80\x81\xe5\x8d\xb3\xe6\x99\x82\xe5\x92\x8c\xe5\x8f\xaf\xe9\x9d\xa0\xe7\x9a\x84\xe4\xb8\x96\xe7\x95\x8c\xe6\x97\x85\xe9\x81\x8a\xe6\x8c\x87\xe5\x8d\x97\xe4\xb9\x8b\xe8\xa8\x88\xe7\x95\xab\xe3\x80\x82\xe7\x9b\xae\xe5\x89\x8d\xe6\x88\x91\xe5\x80\x91\xe5\xb7\xb2\xe6\x94\xb6\xe9\x8c\x84 517 \xe7\xaf\x87\xe4\xbe\x86\xe8\x87\xaa\xe4\xb8\x96\xe7\x95\x8c\xe5\x90\x84\xe5\x9c\xb0 \xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe8\x80\x85 \xe6\x89\x80\xe6\x92\xb0\xe5\xaf\xab\xe7\x9a\x84\xe6\x97\x85\xe9\x81\x8a\xe6\x8c\x87\xe5\x8d\x97\xe6\x88\x96\xe5\x85\xb6\xe4\xbb\x96\xe6\x96\x87\xe7\xab\xa0\xe3\x80\x82\xe4\xbd\xa0\xe5\x8f\xaf\xe4\xbb\xa5\xe5\x85\x88\xe6\x9f\xa5\xe7\x9c\x8b \xe5\xb9\xab\xe5\x8a\xa9\xe9\xa0\x81\xe9\x9d\xa2 \xef\xbc\x8c\xe7\x9e\xad\xe8\xa7\xa3 \xe4\xbd\xa0 \xe5\xb0\x87\xe8\x83\xbd\xe5\xa6\x82\xe4\xbd\x95 \xe7\xab\x8b\xe5\x88\xbb \xe7\xb7\xa8\xe8\xbc\xaf\xe9\x80\x99\xe4\xba\x9b\xe6\x8c\x87\xe5\x8d\x97\xe9\xa0\x81\xe9\x9d\xa2\xef\xbc\x8c\xe6\x88\x96\xe6\x98\xaf\xe5\x89\x8d\xe5\xbe\x80 \xe8\xa8\x88\xe7\x95\xab \xe9\xa0\x81\xe9\x9d\xa2\xe4\xbe\x86\xe4\xba\x86\xe8\xa7\xa3\xe6\x9b\xb4\xe5\xa4\x9a\xe9\x97\x9c\xe6\x96\xbc\xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe7\x9a\x84\xe8\xb3\x87\xe8\xa8\x8a\xef\xbc\x8c\xe4\xbb\xa5\xe5\x8f\x8a\xe5\x8f\x83\xe8\x88\x87\xe6\x88\x91\xe5\x80\x91\xe7\x9a\x84\xe5\x8d\x94\xe4\xbd\x9c\xe8\xa8\x88\xe7\x95\xab\xe3\x80\x82 \xe9\x9d\x9e\xe6\xb4\xb2 \xe4\xba\x9e\xe6\xb4\xb2 \xe6\xbe\xb3\xe6\xb4\xb2 \xe5\x92\x8c \xe5\xa4\xa7\xe6\xb4\x8b\xe6\xb4\xb2 \xe6\xad\x90\xe6\xb4\xb2 \xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x9d\xb1 \xe5\x8c\x97\xe7\xbe\x8e\xe6\xb4\xb2 \xe5\x8d\x97\xe7\xbe\x8e\xe6\xb4\xb2 \xe4\xb8\xad\xe7\xbe\x8e\xe6\xb4\xb2 \xe5\x92\x8c \xe5\x8a\xa0\xe5\x8b\x92\xe6\xaf\x94\xe6\xb5\xb7 \xe5\x85\xb6\xe4\xbb\x96\xe7\x9b\xae\xe7\x9a\x84\xe5\x9c\xb0 \xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe8\xa9\xb1\xe9\xa1\x8c \xe5\x92\x8c \xe6\x9c\x83\xe8\xa9\xb1\xe9\x9b\x86 \xe6\xaf\x8f\xe6\x9c\x88\xe6\x8e\xa8\xe8\x8d\x90 \xe5\x86\xb7\xe9\x97\xa8\xe5\x9c\xb0\xe7\x82\xb9 \xe9\x9d\x9e\xe6\xb4\xb2 \xe9\x97\x9c\xe6\x96\xbc\xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87\xe7\x89\x88 \xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87\xe7\x89\x88\xe7\x9b\xae\xe5\x89\x8d\xe5\xa4\x84\xe4\xba\x8e \xe8\xbf\x9c\xe5\xbe\x81 \xe9\x98\xb6\xe6\xae\xb5\xef\xbc\x8c\xe5\xb9\xb6\xe4\xba\x8e2008\xe5\xb9\xb41\xe6\x9c\x889\xe6\x97\xa5\xe8\xaf\x95\xe8\xbf\x90\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe3\x80\x82\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87\xef\xbc\x88\xe5\x8c\x85\xe5\x90\xab\xe5\x90\x84\xe7\xa7\x8d\xe6\x96\xb9\xe8\xa8\x80\xef\xbc\x89\xe4\xbd\x9c\xe4\xb8\xba\xe5\x85\xa8\xe7\x90\x83\xe4\xba\x94\xe5\x88\x86\xe4\xb9\x8b\xe4\xb8\x80\xe4\xba\xba\xe5\x8f\xa3\xe7\x9a\x84\xe6\xaf\x8d\xe8\xaf\xad\xef\xbc\x8c\xe6\x89\x80\xe4\xbb\xa5\xe4\xb9\x9f\xe6\x98\xaf\xe4\xbc\x97\xe5\xa4\x9a\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe8\x80\x85\xe7\x9a\x84\xe8\xaf\xad\xe8\xa8\x80\xe3\x80\x82\xe5\x8f\xa6\xe5\xa4\x96\xe4\xb8\x80\xe6\x96\xb9\xe9\x9d\xa2\xef\xbc\x8c\xe4\xb8\xad\xe5\x9b\xbd\xe5\xa4\xa7\xe9\x99\x86\xe3\x80\x81\xe5\x8f\xb0\xe6\xb9\xbe\xe3\x80\x81\xe9\xa6\x99\xe6\xb8\xaf\xe3\x80\x81\xe6\xbe\xb3\xe9\x97\xa8\xe4\xb9\x9f\xe6\x98\xaf\xe5\x9b\xbd\xe9\x99\x85\xe4\xb8\x8a\xe7\x9a\x84\xe9\x87\x8d\xe8\xa6\x81\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe7\x9b\xae\xe7\x9a\x84\xe5\x9c\xb0\xe3\x80\x82 \xe5\x9b\xa0\xe6\xad\xa4\xef\xbc\x8c\xe5\x9c\xa8\xe6\xad\xa3\xe5\xbc\x8f\xe5\x95\x9f\xe5\x8b\x95\xe4\xbb\xa5\xe5\x89\x8d\xef\xbc\x8c\xe6\x88\x91\xe5\x80\x91\xe9\x82\x84\xe6\x9c\x89\xe5\xbe\x88\xe5\xa4\x9a\xe5\xb7\xa5\xe4\xbd\x9c\xe9\x9c\x80\xe8\xa6\x81\xe5\xae\x8c\xe6\x88\x90\xe3\x80\x82\xe9\x9c\x80\xe8\xa6\x81 \xe4\xbd\xa0 \xe7\x9a\x84\xe5\x8f\x83\xe8\x88\x87\xef\xbc\x81 \xc2\xa0 \xe7\x95\xb6\xe5\x89\x8d\xe4\xbb\xbb\xe5\x8b\x99 \xe5\xb0\x86 \xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe7\x9a\x84\xe4\xb8\x93\xe6\x9c\x89\xe5\x90\x8d\xe8\xaf\x8d\xe5\x88\x97\xe8\xa1\xa8 \xe7\xbf\xbb\xe8\xaf\x91\xe6\x88\x90\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 \xe4\xb8\xba\xe6\x89\x80\xe6\x9c\x89\xe6\xa0\x87\xe9\xa2\x98\xe5\x88\x9b\xe5\xbb\xba \xe7\xbf\xbb\xe8\xaf\x91\xe5\x88\x97\xe8\xa1\xa8 \xe5\x92\x8c S'Wikitravel:\xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe8\x80\x85 - Wikitravel \xe9\x87\x8d\xe8\xa6\x81\xe5\x91\x8a\xe7\xa4\xba \xc2\xa0: \xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe7\x9a\x84\xe6\x8e\x88\xe6\xac\x8a\xe6\xa2\x9d\xe6\xac\xbe\xe5\xbe\x9eCC by 2.0\xe5\x8d\x87\xe7\xb4\x9a\xe5\x88\xb0CC by-sa 3.0\xef\xbc\x8c \xe8\xa9\xb3\xe7\xb4\xb0\xe6\x83\x85\xe5\xbd\xa2\xe8\xab\x8b\xe5\x8f\x83\xe8\xa6\x8b \xe9\x80\x99\xe8\xa3\xa1 \xe3\x80\x82 \xe7\x9b\xae\xe5\x89\x8d\xe6\x9c\xac\xe7\xab\x99\xe7\x9a\x84\xe7\xae\xa1\xe7\x90\x86\xe5\x93\xa1\xe7\x82\xba: User:msnhinet8 \xe9\x80\x99\xe8\xa3\xa1 \xe3\x80\x82 Wikitravel:\xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe8\x80\x85 \xe6\x9d\xa5\xe8\x87\xaaWikitravel \xe8\xb7\xb3\xe8\xbd\xac\xe5\x88\xb0\xef\xbc\x9a \xe5\xaf\xbc\xe8\x88\xaa , \xe6\x90\x9c\xe7\xb4\xa2 \xe6\x9c\xac\xe9\xa0\x81\xe7\x9a\x84\xe6\x96\xb9\xe9\x87\x9d\xe6\x88\x96\xe6\x8c\x87\xe5\xbc\x95\xe6\x98\xaf\xe7\x9b\xb4\xe6\x8e\xa5\xe7\xbf\xbb\xe8\xad\xaf\xe8\x87\xaa\xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c \xe8\x8b\xb1\xe8\xaa\x9e\xe7\x89\x88 \xef\xbc\x8c\xe5\x85\xa8\xe9\x83\xa8\xe6\x88\x96\xe9\x83\xa8\xe4\xbb\xbd\xe5\x85\xa7\xe5\xae\xb9\xe5\x8f\xaf\xe8\x83\xbd\xe5\xb0\x9a\xe6\x9c\xaa\xe5\x9c\xa8\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87\xe7\x89\x88\xe6\x9c\xac\xe5\x8f\x96\xe5\xbe\x97 \xe5\x85\xb1\xe8\xad\x98 \xef\xbc\x8c\xe5\x83\x85\xe4\xbe\x9b\xe5\x8f\x83\xe8\x80\x83\xe3\x80\x82 \xe8\xab\x8b\xe5\x8f\x83\xe9\x96\xb1\xe6\x9c\xac\xe9\xa0\x81\xe7\x9a\x84 \xe8\xa8\x8e\xe8\xab\x96\xe9\xa0\x81 \xe6\x88\x96 \xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe8\x80\x85\xe8\x8c\xb6\xe9\xa6\x86 \xe7\x9a\x84\xe8\xad\xb0\xe9\xa1\x8c\xe5\x85\xa7\xe5\xae\xb9\xe3\x80\x82 \xe4\xb8\xbb\xe5\x8a\xa8\xe5\x8f\x82\xe4\xb8\x8e\xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe7\x9a\x84\xe4\xba\xba\xe9\x83\xbd\xe6\x98\xaf\xe7\xb6\xad\xe5\xae\xa2\xe6\x97\x85\xe8\xa1\x8c\xe8\x80\x85\xe3\x80\x82 "[Crew] wanted for hazardous journey. Small wages. Bitter cold. Long months of complete darkness. Constant danger. Safe return doubtful. Honour and recognition in case of success." -- Apocryphal recruitment poster for 1914 Antarctic expedition of HMS Endurance Wikitravellers are members of a world-wide community of contributors to Wikitravel . Wikitravel hasn\'t been around long enough to get any distinct idea for what kind of people Wikitravellers are, but it\'s probably safe to say that people who are involved with Wikitravel care about travel in general, and about sharing knowledge with others in particular. Wikitravellers are not a special secret organization or a limited group. We\'re people just like you, interested in travel, and willing to share what we know. You can become a Wikitraveller right now ! We need your help to make this project a success. We have a long way to go -- and anything you can do to contribute gets us that much closer. See also: list of Wikitravellers by location \xe6\x9d\xa5\xe8\x87\xaa\xe2\x80\x9c http://wikitravel.org/zh/Wikitravel:%E7%B6%AD%E5%AE%A2%E6%97%85%E8%A1%8C%E8%80%85 \xe2\x80\x9d S'Snippets | DZone LOG IN or JOIN Home Refcardz Microzones Agile Zone Cloud Zone NoSQL Zone HTML5 Zone DevOps Zone Enterprise Integration Windows Phone .NET Zone Performance Zone Big Data/BI Zone Zones Mobile Zone Javalobby Web Builder Zone IDEs and Tools Eclipse Zone JetBrains Zone NetBeans Zone Languages PHP Zone Groovy Zone Python Zone Ruby Zone Architects Zone Book Zone Server Zone Library Snippets Tutorials Snippets DZone Snippets is a public source code repository. Easily build up your personal collection of code snippets, categorize them with tags / keywords, and share them with the world Snippets Tweet Recent Snippets Getting the barcode region Get BarCode Region Information Read BarCode Image read the BarCodes in the image mark all barcode regions barcode generation Barcode recognition barcode component 1D barcodes 2D barcodes Read BarCodes In The Image & Get BarCode Region Information From Image 03/19/13 by Sheraz Khan in C# [C#] // read code39 barcode from image string image = "code39Extended.jpg"; BarCodeReader reader = new BarCodeReader(image, BarCodeReadType.Code39Standard); // try to recognize all possible barcodes in the image while (reader.Read()) { // get the region information BarCodeRegion region = reader.GetRegion(); if (region != null) { // display x and y coordinates of barcode detected System.Drawing.Point[] point = region.Points; Console.WriteLine("Top left coordinates: X = " + point[0].X + ", Y = " + point[0].Y); Console.WriteLine("Bottom left coordinates: X = " + point[1].X + ", Y = " + point[1].Y); Console.WriteLine("Bottom right coordinates: X = " + point[2].X + ", Y = " + point[2].Y); Console.WriteLine("Top right coordinates: X = " + point[3].X + ", Y = " + point[3].Y); } Console.WriteLine("Codetext: " + reader.GetCodeText()); } // close reader reader.Close(); [VB.NET] \' read code39 barcode from image Dim image As String = "code39Extended.jpg" Dim reader As New BarCodeReader(image, BarCodeReadType.Code39Standard) \' try to recognize all possible barcodes in the image While reader.Read() \' get the region information Dim region As BarCodeRegion = reader.GetRegion() If region IsNot Nothing Then \' display x and y coordinates of barcode detected Dim point As System.Drawing.Point() = region.Points Console.WriteLine("Top left coordinates: X = " & point(0).X & ", Y = " & point(0).Y) Console.WriteLine("Bottom left coordinates: X = " & point(1).X & ", Y = " & point(1).Y) Console.WriteLine("Bottom right coordinates: X = " & point(2).X & ", Y = " & point(2).Y) Console.WriteLine("Top right coordinates: X = " & point(3).X & ", Y = " & point(3).Y) End If Console.WriteLine("Codetext: " & reader.GetCodeText()) End While \' close reader reader.Close() 0 Replies read barcode from image Recognize Barcode from Local Image build URI to read barcode Display value of recognized barcodes display type of recognized barcodes Barcodes Barcodes API Read & Recognize Barcode From Local Images In .NET Applications 03/13/13 by Sherazam Khan in C# //build URI to upload file string fileUploadUri = "http://api.saaspose.com/v1.0/storage/file/test.jpg"; // True indicates case-sensitive comparison, false indicates case-insensitive comparision. replacetext.IsMatchCase = IsMatchCase; // True indicates the oldValue must be a standalone word. replacetext.IsMatchWholeWord = IsMatchWholeWord; S"Geek Vs Geek: Has Time Run Out for Microsoft Office? | eHow Tech | eHow.com tech section Computers Desktops Laptops & Netbooks Software Home Theater DVR, DVD, Blu-ray Sound Systems TVs Mobile Phones Tablets & eReaders Navigation & GPS Mobile Expert Jon Rettinger Personal Electronics Audio Digital Cameras Video & Camcorders Web Browsers Email Stay Connected Websites Web Expert Carley Knobloch More eHow home mom style food tech money health Featured: Tax Time Life's Moments Spring Clean eHow Tech eHow Tech Blog Geek Vs Geek: Has Time Run Out for Microsoft Office? eHow Tech Blog Geek Vs Geek: Has Time Run Out for Microsoft Office? By Dave Johnson Mar 21, 2013 Windows 8 isn\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2t the only new thing from Redmond; there\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s a fresh version of Office as well. But this time around, there\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s a confusing array of versions (Office 2013, Office 365, and many more) and a pricing model that some find distressing. Which version of Office is right for you? Or is the right answer: \xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xc5\x93None of the above?\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xef\xbf\xbd Once a month, eHow Tech editor Dave Johnson faces off against Rick Broida, who writes about technology for CNET, PC World, and Wired. Follow along as they tackle this question from opposing corners. Dave : Microsoft products tend to have a three-year gestation cycle, which means that we\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2ve now got the newest version of Office, whether we need it or not. There was a time when I would automatically lap up the latest version of Office as if it were chocolate gravy, but this year, I\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2m not so sure. Now you have to choose between Office Professional 2013 (a $400 copy you buy outright) and Office 365 Home Premium (a $100 subscription you have to pay every year or the software just stops working). Microsoft seems to have gone out of its way to make upgrading to Office 2013 an unappealing and difficult decision. I\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2m more than half inclined to recommend that people switch to LibreOffice , the free open source alternative. Rick : LibreOffice, OpenOffice , Kingsoft Office Free 2012 , Google Docs , or any of the other free alternatives. I, too, find it borderline insulting that Microsoft continues to charge such steep prices for Office, especially in the face of such competent competitors. That said, the $99-per-year option doesn\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2t seem quite so bad when you consider that it nets you the equivalent of five licenses. Everyone in your family can run Office on their laptop, desktop, tablet, or whatever. Amortized out that way, it\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s $20 per person per year \xe2\x80\x94 a little more palatable, no? Dave : Yes, if you happen to be the Von Trapp Family Singers. But how many ordinary folks need five different copies of Office? My family could use two copies. Three, max. Yet I have to pay for five. And that\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s $100 per year, every year, literally for the rest of my life. At least if I bought a boxed copy, I could pay once and choose when \xe2\x80\x94 or if \xe2\x80\x94 I wanted to give more money to Microsoft for another upgrade. Office 365 is like a bully you have to keep paying so he doesn\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2t hit you. Worse, did you catch what happened with Office Pro? Microsoft originally changed their licensing for Office 2013 by saying you could only install it on a single PC, once, for the life of the software. If your laptop was hit the next day by a meteor or stolen by a flying squirrel, tough luck. You had to buy a new $300 copy. Only when the Internet revolted did they back off that policy. Rick : You\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2re starting to make an awful lot of sense, which is scary. I\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2ll admit that as a self-proclaimed cheapskate, I\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2d never subscribe to Microsoft Office, even if I was sharing it among five people, for exactly the reason you describe: it\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s a life sentence. But there is one bright spot in Microsoft\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s otherwise flawed pricing plans: education. Students can get Office 365 University (plus an extra 20GB of SkyDrive storage) for four years for just $79.99. That\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s $20 per year! Makes me want to go back to school. Dave : Why are we even having this conversation? It\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s insane to spend $400 for a software package in 2013. You can buy an entire computer for that! What\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s even new in Office 2013 to justify my money? Most people hardly use a fraction of the features in Office to begin with Take a survey of how most people use Excel, for example. In any given office, 8 out of 10 people use it like a giant table to organize information. They are only barely aware that the program does math any more sophisticated than addition and subtraction. These people \xe2\x80\x94 most people \xe2\x80\x94 should be using a free alternative. Rick : I agree 100 percent: Office has lots of features that few people use. On the other hand, it\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s Microsoft\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s bestselling product (other than Windows, of course), so obviously people like it and want it. And Office 2013/365 represents the best version yet because it\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s cloud-savvy and has interface improvements that actually make sense. In Outlook, for example, there\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s a one-click option to view only your unread e-mail. And the controversial Ribbon is now optional; you can hide it if you prefer. Price notwithstanding, this is the single best office suite you can buy, period. In fact, take price out of the picture entirely and tell me you wouldn\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2t choose Office 2013 over all competitors. Dave : Well of course I\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2d choose Office if it were free . I\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2d also live on a diet of cupcakes and pizza if they were nutritionally equivalent to broccoli. If I had to be honest to our readers, I\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2d say that only suckers (and businesses with deep pockets) spend money on a word processor and spreadsheet program anymore. After all, if a one-click \xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xc5\x93view unread mail\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xef\xbf\xbd button is the best reason you can think of to spend $400 (or $100 a year for life), then innovation is truly dead. Can you give me even a single reason not to switch to LibreOffice this very afternoon? Rick : Sure: Outlook. There\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s no other contact/calendar/mail manager around that even comes close. LibreOffice and its ilk don\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2t even have a mail client. The only viable open-source option is Thunderbird, but Mozilla has stopped developing it. What\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s more, you\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2re overlooking a very important consideration for consumers and business users alike: file compatibility. Few free/open-source Office alternatives are fully file-compatible with Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Some can open those kinds of documents, but most can save only to older formats. Talk about a hassle! Dave : You make a fair point about Outlook. For some reason, software developers appear to have given up on creating full-featured mail clients about 20 years ago. I can\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2t even remember the last time I saw any mail program at all aside from Outlook. Weird, right? But no worries \xe2\x80\x94 just use Gmail instead. Or Outlook.com. Webmail supports POP and IMAP just fine. And as for file compatibility, I\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2ll say that open source alternatives are compatible enough. They read and write Office file formats just fine 90% of the time. Sure, there\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s an occasional glitch, but honestly, I\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2ve even run into bizarre compatibility problems between different versions of Word. So, nothing\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s perfect. Good enough. Rick : Hey, pal, we didn\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2t put a man on the moon with \xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xc5\x93good enough.\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xef\xbf\xbd If you want the best productivity suite money can buy, you need Microsoft Office. Much as I wish I could hand-pick my own suite (Word, Excel, OneNote, and Publisher, please) and buy it for, say, $50, sometimes you have to pony up. A milk crate is \xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xc5\x93good enough\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xef\xbf\xbd to sit on, but when I\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2m parked in front of the TV, I want a comfy leather couch. And that\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2s what Office is: my comfy leather couch. You enjoy your crate, sir. Who won? We\xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x84\xa2d love to hear from you. Weigh in with your opinion in the comments, or tweet @davejoh . And what other tech topics would you like to see Dave and Rick discuss? Send your ideas to Dave via Twitter @davejoh . Read Previous: Galaxy S 4 Unveiled \xc3\xa2\xe2\x82\xac\xe2\x80\x9c Great Hardware but the Focus is on Accessories Comments 745028338 Mar 23, 2013 Just as an idea of how powerful and awesome Open Source is, our Fab Lab was recently contacted by a Veterinary Surgeon who had a tricky surgery to perform. He wondered if it was possible to print a copy of the dog's bones so he could better prepare. Turns out it was not just possible, but relatively simple and I did it using all open source software and an open source printer (the Huxley), learning as I went. Even the CT Scan Data format (Dicom) is open. I 1238859597 Mar 23, 2013 Dave makes a good argument as far as money is concerned but its the compatibility of software that worries me the most. All said n done, I'm inspired to try LibreOffice and Thunderbird. 100002054929818 Mar 22, 2013 I must be an exception, I barely know how to build an Excel spreadsheet with putting in a bunch. of macros and often a gaggle of buttons to trigger them. And conditional formatting all over the. place! There's no way any of the open source alternatives will open more than 10% of my. spreadsheets, so I'm totally committed to Excel. I don't use very many macros in Word, but even. there I do use a few. Don't know what I would do without Visio either, that's just so useful! Access is useful too but I wish I were more proficient with it. For now I'm going to just stay with Office 2010 on all four of the computers in our house. Office Pro 2013 X 4 plus 2 copies of Visio is a big bite for a retiree, and Office 365 Pro isn't all. that attractive either but it wins on price. I do NOT put anything on the web, all of our files. go on a NAS in the house and are shared within the home network but never exposed to the web. I don't need or want the Skydrive features or anything else web related, I want to keep my PCs as. Personal Computers! Andy Follow eHow Follow @eHow Dave Johnson Tech Editor Dave Johnson is editor of eHow's Tech channel and the author of about 3 dozen books including the best-selling How to Do Everything with Your Digital Camera. He has appeared in dozens of magazines and websites, including PC World, Wired, and CBS MoneyWatch. Most Popular in Tech Geek Vs Geek: Has Time Run Out for Microsoft Office? S'Raising the Stakes: Bedtimes, Allowance and Responsibilities | eHow.com mom section Living Well Mom Time Healthy Eating Family Health Home Management Everyday Style Family & Relationships Family Marriage Divorce Dating Friends Education & Activities Crafts Enrichment Activities Education Games & Toys Recreation Travel & Outings Parenting Conception to Birth Newborns & Babies Toddlers Children Teenagers Parenting Advice More eHow home mom style food tech money health Featured: Tax Time Life\'s Moments Spring Clean eHow Parenting General Parenting Raise Responsible Children Raising the Stakes: Bedtimes, Allowance and Responsibilities Raising the Stakes: Bedtimes, Allowance and Responsibilities Small Steps Are Best When It Comes to Changing a Child\'s Routine Print this article Allow your child to try challenging tasks when she shows initiative.(photo: Kraig Scarbinsky/Photodisc/Getty Images) It is essential to figure out what the most effective reward for that particular child is when adding responsibility. \xe2\x80\x94 Stacey Glaesmann, licensed professional counselor in Texas. Establishing routines is key to running a well-oiled household. But, how do you know when it\xe2\x80\x99s time to change things up, offer your children more freedom and step up the responsibilities of each family member? \xe2\x80\x9cAs children grow older, there are two possible pitfalls: letting them stay babies or trying to make them grow up too fast,\xe2\x80\x9d said Crystal Lutton, Arizona-based mom of five and author of \xe2\x80\x9cGrace-Based Living.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x9cFinding that balance of respecting them where they are is such an important thing.\xe2\x80\x9d If your children seem bored or even resistant when it comes to chores, rules, allowances and even bedtimes, it may be time to re-evaluate the routine. Tuning In to Your Child A household will run much more smoothly if you\'re willing to re-evaluate what\'s working on a daily basis. Even though your child may excel at completing his chore chart each day, he may need to be challenged to take on more responsibility. Lutton recommends giving him opportunities to show you what he can do. \xe2\x80\x9cSometimes, I will ask (children) to run and do something for me, and I see if they can,\xe2\x80\x9d she said. \xe2\x80\x9cIf they can\xe2\x80\x99t, it\xe2\x80\x99s fine. I just jump in to help, but I am often surprised.\xe2\x80\x9d As soon as children start showing initiative, Lutton says, it\xe2\x80\x99s time to move out of the way. \xe2\x80\x9cNo need to be offended by the \xe2\x80\x98me do it myself\xe2\x80\x99 stage," she said. "Let them." Reminders of the need for more responsibility will also prepare your children for additional duties. \xe2\x80\x9cI spend a lot of time telling my children, \xe2\x80\x98When you are able, you will use the potty, clean your room and put away groceries,\xe2\x80\x99\xe2\x80\x9d Lutton said. Behavior and age will also help you determine when to increase a child\'s household chores and responsibilities. Lutton said she did this when her kids hit 5, 8 and 11. \xe2\x80\x9cI can tell it\xe2\x80\x99s time to increase responsibilities when the child does what I term \xe2\x80\x98stealing freedom.\xe2\x80\x99 Often they begin to sneak around and do something unacceptable,\xe2\x80\x9d she says. \xe2\x80\x9cAt that point, we sit down and I explain that any stolen privilege is one you are not ready for, but their behavior is showing me that they are ready for more freedom.\xe2\x80\x9d The child has to understand the only way to get the freedom she\'s ready for is to take on more responsibility, Lutton says. \xe2\x80\x9cResponsibility earns privileges," she said. "We talk about some chores they can begin to take on and we talk about something that I will give them as a privilege because of this new level of responsibility.\xe2\x80\x9d Family Chores Developing a chore plan for the entire family could keep your household in shape and your children motivated. Jennifer Kogan, a family therapist in Washington, D.C., recommends a family meeting to determine responsibilities. \xe2\x80\x9cThis should be framed as a fun activity where parents can then outline for everyone that they want everyone to contribute something to help the house function,\xe2\x80\x9d she said. \xe2\x80\x9cKids and parents can draw or write their ideas on paper and it can then be posted somewhere where people can see and refer to it.\xe2\x80\x9d The key element is to have every family member contribute to the plan. Kogan said that approach helps everyone feel as if they have a hand in making the plan. That ensures, she said, that your kids will buy into helping out. Regular family meetings to tweak the plan allows you to address other issues such as bedtime. \xe2\x80\x9cFamily meetings," Kogan said, "also help to create a strong family culture." Cashing In Children can start earning their piggy bank money at an early age. (photo: Jupiterimages/Goodshoot/Getty Images) Maturity can also trigger other adjustments, such as how much allowance the child gets. Stephanie Coffin, parenting expert with Bellies, Babies & Beyond, an online parenting resource, thinks it should happen as soon as the child is physically able to do more around the house. "Teaching children the harder they work the more allowance they will get is an invaluable goal for when they are adults,\xe2\x80\x9d she said. Before giving out raises, Coffin recommends looking at the big picture. How long will they get an allowance? Will there need to be a raise every year or two years? How much will you be able to afford in five years? While your children should complete some chores without monetary rewards, adding extra incentives and raising allowances for tougher work may motivate them to do more without resistance. Stacey Glaesmann, a Texas-based licensed professional counselor, recommends making chores part of the family\xe2\x80\x99s normal routine at an early age. \xe2\x80\x9cSmall children usually want to help Mommy or Daddy around the house,\xe2\x80\x9d she said. \xe2\x80\x9cThis is a great time to introduce the concept of chores and start rewarding the child with praise for completing tasks.\xe2\x80\x9d It\'s only natural for children to resist chores as they get older. That\'s yet another reason Glaesmann thinks you should get them in the habit early. \xe2\x80\x9cFor older kids, it is essential to figure out what the most effective reward for that particular child is when adding responsibility,\xe2\x80\x9d she said. \xe2\x80\x9cIt could be money, but it could also be going somewhere or seeing a certain friend.\xe2\x80\x9d Pushing Back Bedtimes Increasing your child\'s bedtime in small increments will help him adjust. (photo: Thomas Northcut/Lifesize/Getty Images) Bedtimes may be a point of tension if your child craves more freedom. Glaesmann recommends setting new bedtimes by taking cues from your child. \xe2\x80\x9cIf the parent is putting the child to bed at a certain time and the child is lying there awake for another hour, then it\xe2\x80\x99s probably time to let him stay up later,\xe2\x80\x9d she said. \xe2\x80\x9cHowever, if the child exhibits bad behavior in the evenings, then letting him stay up longer will only reinforce the behavior. These issues involve a lot of parental instinct.\xe2\x80\x9d Lutton says behavior and maturity level both play a role in how late a child should be able to stay up. \xe2\x80\x9cIf you begin to notice your child having trouble falling asleep or waking up extremely early in the morning, you may want to try and let his bedtime be later,\xe2\x80\x9d she said. It may help to test the waters on weekends. If you let your child stay up a little later on a Friday or Saturday night, wake him up at the same time you would for a school day and have him do the same school day routines. \xe2\x80\x9cYou will be able to notice if your child is ready to stay up later by his actions and attitude throughout the day,\xe2\x80\x9d Lutton said. Adjusting bedtime in small increments could also help your child adapt to his newfound freedom. "It is smart to start to slowly increase bedtime to see how your child reacts," Lutton said. "You will know best if your child is too tired the next day and his bedtime should stay constant." Photo Credit Kraig Scarbinsky/Photodisc/Getty Images Jupiterimages/Goodshoot/Getty Images Thomas Northcut/Lifesize/Getty Images Resources Crystal Lutton Bellies, Babies & Beyond Stacey Glaesmann, MA, LPC Jennifer Kogan, LICSW Read Next: Print this article Comments Follow eHow Follow @eHow Related Ads Get Ideas Kid-Pleasing Homemade Chicken Nuggets Related Articles & Videos How to Enforce Children\'s Bedtimes Bedtime Crafts for Kids What Time is a Good Bedtime for Children? S'CB Radio Repair | How to Repair Electronics Save Time And Money! Find It Fast !>>>>>> Find LOCAL Repair Resources Get FREE Fix-It Android App Common Repairs Made Easy! \xe2\x84\xa2 by the Fix-It Club > Electronics > CB Radio Repair FREE Fix-It Guides: Fix-It Basics Fix-It Tips Apparel & Jewelry Electrical Electronics Exercise & Leisure Heating & Cooling Home Exterior Home Interior Major Appliances Plumbing Small Appliances Yard & Garden Parts & Components Recycling Home Free Repair Help! Android App: Electronics CB Radio Repair \xc2\xa9 The Fix-It Club. All rights reserved. Enter part or model #: << prev | 1 | 2 | 3 | next>> CB radios have been quietly popular for 30 years. When they first came on the scene, CB radios were liberating. They gave housewives, bored commuters, and students of human nature a new language: CB. "Ten-four" became an abused term. After the wild interest moved on to the Internet chat rooms, CB continued to serve its initial purpose: two-way communication on a budget. Here\'s how to fix a CB, good buddy. How Does It Work? Citizens band radios are miniature receivers and transmittersthat fall under the jurisdiction of the Federal Communications Commission (FCC). Work on the transmitter components should be done only by an FCC radiotelephone-licensed service person. A citizens band (CB) radio is both a receiver and a transmitter. A radio receiver is an electronic device that receives audio signals through an antenna, then amplifies and sends the sound to speakers. A transmitter does the opposite: it takes microphone (a reverse speaker) signals, converts them into electronic signals, and distributes them via an antenna. CB radios have 40 channels on which you can speak and/or listen. Some, such as channel 9, are set aside for special purposes (emergency assistance), but most are open to whatever you want to talk about. Mobile radios and mobile telephones work approximately the same way. What Can Go Wrong? Mobile CB radios, those installed in cars and trucks, run on car battery power. Base stations are corded radio transmitters and receivers. A battery or cord may need replacing. Many CBs have fuses that can be replaced, often from the back of the unit. Contacts can be bent of corroded. Controls and switches may be dirty. Antennas can break or become disconnected. Because CB radios transmit electronic signals, they come under the jurisdiction of the Federal Communications Commission. You\'ll need an FCC technician\'s license to work on a CB or mobile radio, other than a few tasks that can\'t impact transmission. Cleaning a CB is okay, as is replacing an antenna. And you can replace a Fuse. << prev | 1 | 2 | 3 | next>> Can\'t Find It?\xe2\x80\x83 Return to Top of Page Electronics Fix-It Guides Repair Resources \xc2\xa9 Copyright 2003 - 2013 by Fix It Club\xc2\xa0|\xc2\xa0 Site Map \xc2\xa0|\xc2\xa0 About \xc2\xa0|\xc2\xa0 Fix-It Club Parts \xc2\xa0|\xc2\xa0 Fix-It Club Tools \xc2\xa0|\xc2\xa0 Fix-It Bookclub \xc2\xa0|\xc2\xa0 Webmaster \xc2\xa0|\xc2\xa0 Privacy \xc2\xa0|\xc2\xa0 Resources \xc2\xa0|\xc2\xa0 Advertise Other Mulligan Press websites: Interactive Fix-It Club , DontKnowCars.com , DontKnowRemodeling.com , DontKnowMoving.com , DontKnowFloors.com , SolarHomeGuides.com , CottageIncome.com , Mulligan Aviation websites . S'GetBlogs | Wordpress Hosting, Plugins, Themes and More Wordpress Hosting, Plugins, Themes and More Search Main menu Skip to primary content Skip to secondary content Article Directory Blog Directory Top 100 WordPress Plugins Top 100 WordPress Plugins \xc2\xa0 Ecommerce \xc2\xa0 1.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Eshop http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/eshop/ eShop is an accessible shopping cart plugin for WordPress. It is packed with various features, including basic statistics, sales data, various payment options, various methods to list products,\xc2\xa0 basic stock control and various discount options. Most importantly, it can be linked with multiple merchant gateways including Authorize.net, Paypal, Payson, eProcessingNetwork, Webtopay, iDEAL and Cash/Cheque! \xc2\xa0 2.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Shopp https://shopplugin.net/ Shopp is an e-commerce plugin that adds a feature-rich online store to your WordPress-powered website or blog. Get your store up and running in minutes. Then, take it to the next level with the flexibility of Shopp\xe2\x80\x99s customization tools that allow production studios and power users to tailor every aspect of the shopping experience. \xc2\xa0 3.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 PayPal Payment Terminal WordPress http://codecanyon.net/item/paypal-payment-terminal-wordpress/166082 With its super easy installation, PayPal Payment Terminal WordPress allows you to start accepting paypal payments on your wordpresssite.\xc2\xa0 You can display it as a widget or on any page/post, view and sort all transactions and send out automatic notifications to your customers and yourself. \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 4.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 uPricing \xe2\x80\x93 Pricing Table for WordPress http://codecanyon.net/item/upricing-pricing-table-for-wordpress/145538 uPricing is a pricing table for WordPress. It is a standalone plugin that allows you to create a pricing table to list your products in. Perfect for comparing products across their features and price. \xc2\xa0 5.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 GetShopped http://getshopped.org/ The WP e-Commerce Plugin is offered under GetShopped and is a shop owner\xe2\x80\x99s dream. It offers a fully integrated shopping cart application suitable for selling your digital and tangible products, services, and or fees online. It can be integrated with Google Checkout, DPS / Paystation, Paypal and offers an audio player module for selling mp3 files and digital downloads. Its functionality can be extended by using add-on plugins. \xc2\xa0 uture\xc2\xa0 create multiple funnels and export all data for reference.ze where they enter from. Easily edit the Slide nize 6.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 PHPurchase http://www.phpurchase.com/ PHPurchase allows you to sell digital and physical products, collect recurring payments for subscriptions, memberships, and payment plans. You can even build a complete membership site with plugin and set up coupon codes for promotions. \xc2\xa0 7.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 WordPressDealpon http://www.warriorforum.com/warrior-special-offers-forum/429220-1500-sold-warrior-special-offer-day-wp-dealpon-automated-coupon-offers-wordpress-inside-facebook.html WP Dealpon is a completely automated, turn-key wordpress plugin that will let you run automatically controlled special offers right from your wordpress blog. You can run special offers for your products, resurrect older offers with a new, special discount and improve your promotional campaign for your products. \xc2\xa0 8.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Funnel Press http://www.warriorforum.com/warrior-special-offers-forum/435546-maximize-conversions-stop-losing-customers-leads-simple-use-wordpress-plugin.html Funnel Press makes it easy to track all visitors in your sales funnel process on any wordpress installation. Find out where and how many customers are dropping out of your sales process and which page/post is NOT converting. You can create multiple funnels and export all data for future reference. \xc2\xa0 9.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Quick Shop http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/quick-shop/ Quick Shop supports any WordPress that has the sidebar widgets installed. It adds a SideBar widget that shows the user what they currently have in the cart and allows them to remove the items, not to mention a TinyMCE button to easily allow you to add products to your posts/pages. Contact/Email Plugin \xc2\xa0 10.\xc2\xa0 Contact Form 7 http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/contact-form-7/ Contact Form 7 can manage multiple contact forms, plus you can customize the form and the mail contents flexibly with simple mark up. The form supports Ajax-powered submitting, CAPTCHA, Akismet spam filtering and so on. \xc2\xa0 11.\xc2\xa0 Fast Secure Contact Form http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/si-contact-form/ This plugin allows you to easily create and add contact forms on yourWordPress site. The contact form will let the user send emails to a site\xe2\x80\x99s admin. An administration panel is present, where the webmaster can create and preview unlimited forms. \xc2\xa0 12.\xc2\xa0 Scaleable Contact Form http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/scaleable-contact-form/ This is a contact form plugin which creates a very customizable contact form on your WordPress blog. It uses Captcha to prevent spam submissions and you can configure required, non-required fields. \xc2\xa0 13.\xc2\xa0 Gravity Forms http://www.gravityforms.com/ Gravity Forms lets you build and publish your WordPress forms in just minutes. No drudgery, just quick and easy form-building. Select your fields, configure your options and easily embed forms on your WordPress powered site using the built-in tools. General \xc2\xa0 14.\xc2\xa0 WP Super Cache http://ocaoimh.ie/wp-super-cache/ WP Super Cache is a static caching plugin for WordPress. It generates html files that are served directly by Apache without processing comparatively heavy PHP scripts. By using this plugin you will speed up your WordPress blog significantly. \xc2\xa0 15.\xc2\xa0 Google Web Fonts for WordPress http://codecanyon.net/item/google-web-fonts-for-wordpress/242339 Google Fonts Pro is a premium WordPress plugin that allows you to instantly access over 200 of Google\xe2\x80\x99s Web Fonts with power and ease. You can take full control over the font and typography used on your site in a matter of minutes! \xc2\xa0 16.\xc2\xa0 Exclude Pages http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/exclude-pages/ This plugin comes in handy when you want to create pages that you don\xe2\x80\x99t want the general visitors on your site to view. This means that you can specify pages which will only be accessible through their direct URL and not visible on the main page. \xc2\xa0 17.\xc2\xa0 Email Users http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/email-users/ A plugin for wordpress which allows you to send an email to the registered blog users. Users can send personal emails to each other. Power users can email groups of users and even notify group of users of posts. 18.\xc2\xa0 Subscribe 2 http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/subscribe2/ Subscribe2 provides a comprehensive subscription management and email notification system for WordPress blogs that sends email notifications to a list of subscribers when you publish new content to your blog. Email Notifications can be sent on a per-post basis or periodically in a Digest email. \xc2\xa0 19.\xc2\xa0 WP Simplicity http://wpsimplicity.com \xc2\xa0 WP Simplicity is an amazing blogging tool, which allows you to leverage your time and your income. It is developed with the most advanced features to offer time-saving solutions and transform blogging experience. It eliminates the headache of creating and managing WordPress sites. \xc2\xa0 20.\xc2\xa0 WordPress Auto-Translator Plugin http://www.warriorforum.com/warrior-special-offers-forum/422340-limited-quantity-brand-new-wp-plugin-multi-site-license-facebook-iframe-compatible.html This is a WordPress auto translation plugin that uses IP address technology. Once installed, the plugin can translate all WordPress pages including widgets. It is able to display counts for popular social butons like Digg, LinkedIn, Google +1, Reddit, dDone, Twitter, TweetMeme, Topsy, Yahoo Buzz, facebook share, facebook like, StumbleUpon, Delicious, Sphinn, Google Buzz, Designbump, WebBlend, BlogEngage and Serpd. \xc2\xa0 90.\xc2\xa0 Wibya Toolbar http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/wibiya/ Wibiya Toolbar enables blogs to integrate Facebook likes, Facebook recommendations, Twitter feeds and the ability to share through customized web-based toolbar into their blog. \xc2\xa0 91.\xc2\xa0 Social Slider http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/social-slider-2/ The Social Slider plugin display on your blog an expandable box, that has links to your profiles in different social sites. It can be easily customized to include more social site icons and its position can be changed on your site. \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 92.\xc2\xa0 Facebook Like Box Widget http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/facebook-like-box-widget/ Facebook Like Box Widget is a social plugin that enables Facebook Page owners to attract and gain Likes & Recommendation Comments from their own website. The Like Box enables users to: see how many users already like this page, and which of their friends like it too, read recent posts from the page and Like the page with one click, without needing to visit the page. \xc2\xa0 93.\xc2\xa0 Twitter Goodies Widgets http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/twitter-goodies-widgets/ This plugin will allow you to create any one of the four Twitter widgets located at twitter\xe2\x80\x99s website twitter.com/goodies/widgetspage with the friendly wordpress drag & drop convenience of widgets. \xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0You can save multiple themes for your twitter widget and easly switch between the different twitter widget types. \xc2\xa0 94.\xc2\xa0 Facebook Traffic Pop http://codecanyon.net/item/facebook-traffic-pop-for-wordpress/150963 Facebook traffic pop is a plugin that create \xe2\x80\x98popups\xe2\x80\x99 that will allow you to have your users like your pages. \xc2\xa0This generates you free publicity on Facebook with the help of your web visitors.\xc2\xa0 The plugin is fully customized right from the WordPress admin area. \xc2\xa0 95.\xc2\xa0 Social Media Widget http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/social-media-widget/ The Social Media Widget is a simple sidebar widget that allows users to input their social media website profile URLs and other subscription options to show an icon on the sidebar to that social media site and more that open up in a separate browser window. Slideshow/Presentation \xc2\xa0 96.\xc2\xa0 NextGen Gallery http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/nextgen-gallery/ NextGEN Gallery is a full integrated Image Gallery plugin for WordPress with dozens of options and features. You can add custom templates for your theme and you can customize each gallery to suit your needs. You can create albums of images and\xc2\xa0 display the pictures in the sidebar widget. \xc2\xa0 97.\xc2\xa0 Page Flip Image Gallery http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/page-flip-image-gallery/ Page Flip Image Gallery plugin helps you to create an image gallery with page flip effects on your blog.\xc2\xa0 You can create a pop-up image gallery. The plugin uses JPG, SWF files as a page for your Flipping Book. \xc2\xa0 98.\xc2\xa0 Drop In Image Slideshow Gallery http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/drop-in-image-slideshow-gallery/ This drop in image slide show gallery plugin is a simple, image slideshow plugin where each image is dropped into view. The gallery can be placed at any position as it is a widget. \xc2\xa0 99.\xc2\xa0 vSlider Multi Image Slider for WordPress http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/vslider/ Using the vSlider plugin, you can showcase your portfolio, animate your header or manage your banners. The image slider plugin where you can host multiple image sliders and upto 20 slides per slider. \xc2\xa0 100.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 GRAND FlAGallery \xe2\x80\x93 Best Photo & Media Gallery http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/flash-album-gallery/ soc Grand FlaGallery is a photo gallery, video gallery, music album & banner rotator plugin with powerfull admin to manage your media content. You can edit your media content the way you want: upload images, import music and video, create photo gallery, music playlists, group pictures in slideshow and add descriptions for each image, mp3. You can easily beautify your site with photo gallery, mp3 player, video player or nice widgets. \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 Leave a Reply Cancel reply You must be logged in to post a comment. Sites to checkout Press Release Service The Best Spinner Categories No categories Proudly powered by WordPress\n'
